The equipment cards can consist of weapons or enhancements.

While the base game is free to play, there are a variety of content packs available to supplement it. These range in price from $20 to $50 and can be purchased for all available platforms.
Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 X2
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon X1600

Title: Omega Zodiac
short_description: A Greek and Norse mythology based free-to-play action MMO developed and published by Proficient City and Game Hollywood.
Description:
Omega Zodiac is a Greek and Norse mythology based free-to-play action MMO developed and published by Proficient City and Game Hollywood. This browser-based game features guild battles and world bosses while giving players one of three classes to play as. Players can take the role of the knight — and up-close and personal melee class, the archer, and the arcane mage.

Each boast their own abilities — nine combo skills each, as well as 5 constellations per character with their own set of skills. Players can also unlock Sacred Sets of armor by collecting Star Maps. Activating the sets via Star Maps will boost certain character stats.

As with most MMORPGs, there is a full story to take part in as well as PvE and PvP. PvP includes guild battles while PvE players can battle world bosses that spawn every couple of hours.

The game is free-to-play via the Omega Zodiac site.

Title: The Elder Scrolls: Legends
short_description: A free-to-play CCG based on The Elder Scrolls franchise.
Description:
The Elder Scrolls: Legends is a free-to-play strategy card game based on the popular Bethesda Softworks Elder Scrolls franchise. It’s playable on both PC and iPad. Bethesda plans to launch the game in North America and Europe with localizations for English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, and Polish-speaking countries.

Taking characters, creatures and lore from the vast world of the Elder Scrolls games, Bethesda has created a collectable card game with a variety of gameplay modes designed to give players freedom to choose how they want to play.

In Elder Scrolls Legends, players are able to acquire card packs and arena tickets by either purchasing them or earning them in game. Prices for both of these items have not been revealed as of yet.

Those interested in The Elder Scrolls: Legends can apply for Closed Beta testing on the official game site.
Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athalon 64 X2
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6800 (256 MB) or aTI Radeon X1600 Pro (256 MB)

Title: Riders of Icarus
short_description: A free-to-play action MMORPG featuring mounted, in-air combat.
Description:
Riders of Icarus is a free-to-play action MMORPG featuring mounted, in-air combat. Developed by WeMade and published by Nexon America, the game offers players a wide variety of winged creatures for players to collect — as well as a selection of land creatures. These are trainable and can be used as more than just a simple ride when in combat. Each of them has unique abilities and can be collected more than once.

Creatures are “tamed” in various ways and can be turned into mounts or companions — although not both at the same time. This means that players who want to collect all of them will need to tame the same creature twice. It’s part of the collectors aspect of the game.

Players can work together to coordinate large aerial battles against other players or head to the ground to take on bosses. Both types of combat use an action-oriented melee combo system, with a newly updated action mode that can be toggled on and off.

At present, Riders of Icarus is still in Beta, although those interested can purchase Founders Packs via the official site.

Title: Naruto Online
short_description:
A free-to-play MMO based on the popular anime series and manga, developed 
by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
Description:
Naruto Online is a free-to-play MMO based on the popular anime series and manga, developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game follows the story line of the anime series with five new characters that represent the elements of earth, water, fire, wind, and lightning. Players choose one of these characters to play as.

Players have the opportunity to relive key moments from the series while building their own ninja team consisting of characters from the show. The game features a combo fighting system that takes advantage of the team option as well as a variety of modes from single player to multi-player dungeons. There are also giant world bosses to fight and several ways for players to earn XP without getting bored.

Naruto is a broswer-based game and can be played without the need of any downloads.

Title: Zula
short_description: A free-to-play online FPS developed and published by IDC/Games.
Description:
Zula is a free-to-play online FPS developed and published by IDC/Games. The game takes place in real-world locations such as Istanbul and offers players the chance to play as either a group of vigilantes called the Zula and an international paramilitary force — the Gladyo.

It features at least ten maps and a selection of modes for players to choose from. These include Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Free for All, and Wanted. There are 16 playable characters — all inspired by television heroes — for players to pick from and all character outfits are based on paramilitary specs.

To make their characters unique, players will have more than 150 customizable weapons to use in game.

Title: LuckCatchers
short_description: A free-to-play sandbox sim based on the novels of fantasy and steam-punk author A. Pehov.
Description:
LuckCatchers is a free-to-play sandbox sim based on the novels of fantasy and steam-punk author A. Pehov. Technically, the game would be a prequel to those novels, being set 300 years prior to them. It’s a world without rules, open to any choices players make from the start.

In LuckCatchers, players will concentrate on social and economic features — including trade, and of course, war. There are over 30 NPC-ruled cities where players can do a variety of things, as well as a player-based world trade system and a real labor market. Regular game events include lotteries, dragon migrations, and plane races.

LuckCatchers is not a casual game, and does feature PvP. However, new players are protected from it for the first month of playtime. Players can gather resources, craft, build a government, and more. This includes building ships and planes based on your own designs, producing weapons and ammunition, and constructing settlements.

The game is available to play on Steam.
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz or AMD AthalonTM 64 X2 5600+ 2.8GHz
Graphics: GeForce x60 or best; ATI HD4870 or best; 1Gb videoRAM

Title: UFO Online: Invasion
short_description:
A free-to-play post-apocalyptic, turn-based tactical combat 
MMO developed by Bad Pixel.
Description:
UFO Online: Invasion is a free-to-play post-apocalyptic, turn-based tactical combat MMORPG developed by Bad Pixel. Set some time after Earth is attacked by a massive alien vessel in 2024, the game tasks players with handling the aftermath of a global war. The aliens may have been defeated and left, but they also left a mark — in the form of alien life-forms and infrastructure that were abandoned during their retreat.

Invasion features “simultaneous turns tactical combat,” which helps speed up the process of the game. Players spend 60 seconds during the Planning Phase to decide their actions and watch everything happen during the Simulation phase. This results in the game being able to handle massive PvP battles with dozens of players involved.

Other features the game boats are a large open world filled with hidden treasures, quests, missions and more, a player-driven industry and economy, a skill system featuring more than 100 skills and 11 masteries, conquerable bases, and the ability to create and improve clans.

In addition to the free base game, Bad Pixel also offers three pieces of purchasable DLC: a Starter Kit, Mod Kit, and Adrenaline Kit. Prices for all vary with the total of all three being a little under $23.
Graphics: any DirectX 9.0c compatible with 128 MB VRAM

Title: Weapons Of Mythology
short_description: A 3D free-to-play fantasy MMORPG published by IDC/Games.
Description:
Weapons of Mythology: New Age is a free-to-play fantasy MMORPG published by IDC/Games. Built on the Unity 3D engine, the game casts players in the role of the hero, tasking them stopping the “dark side”.

The game is set during the Chu Han Contention and focuses on the Zhan and Jie sects. These two sects each serve their own king in the fight for the ultimate ancient Relic.

Play-wise, Weapons of Mythology features everything players expect from a modern MMO, PvP, boss hunts, territory wars, and more. Players can play as one of five classes, create and join guilds, use Relics to build out their character, and acquire pets able to take on human form.

To play, players will need to download the client via the official game site.

Title: Tree of Savior
short_description: A fantasy 3D MMORPG with a massive freedom of choice, cute looking characters and a distinct art style.
Description:
Many anxiously await the arrival of Tree of Savior (TOS), a fantasy 3D MMORPG with a massive freedom of choice, cute looking characters and a distinct art style. The game is being touted as a spiritual successor to the still popular Ragnarok Online, and that is more than enough to whet the appetite of MMORPG fans the world over.

Tree of Savior mimics many of the elements of Ragnarok Online, such as the attractive art style and the gameplay mechanics. More impressive is the fact that players will be treated to a musical score crafted by the same composers who gave Ragnarok Online its strong soundtrack.

Over 80 classes will be available to players in Tree of Savior, making combat and gameplay, fun, engaging, and varied all across the board. Monster cards, like those of Ragnarok Online, will also be making an appearance. Tree of Savior also features PVP Content with the Team Battle League and Guild Wars (GvG).

Fans of Ragnarok Online are waiting on baited breath for Tree of Savior to arrive and bring them into a whole new MMORPG experience.

Title: Starbreak
short_description:
A Roguelike MMORPG with MetroidVania-style platformer 
gameplay! Castlevania and Metroid fans will 
love this game!
Description:
Explore new and strange sci-fi worlds in Starbreak, a free-to-play roguelike action platformer MMO with MetroidVania-esque gameplay from Crunchy Games. Starbreak focuses on fast-paced gameplay that forces players to think on their feet when facing the game’s challenges. StarBreak is inspired by popular platformers, such as Castlevania and Metroid, but re-imagined with randomly generated content.

Players will start by choosing one of four shells in Starbreak: Wildfire, Duskwing, Ironclad, and Fabricator. Each one has its own unique abilities that affect the game in different ways. Players can also join together in multiplayer co-op in order to tackles the challenges together and share in the loot.

Gameplay is challenging in Starbreak, requiring players to time their attacks, jumps, and fights carefully. If players are careless, their character can die permanently, forcing them to start all over again. And with such unique environments to explore, adventure and risk are never far away.

Starbreak also has over 200 unique items to collect, giving players a wide range of items to either equip or sell in order to empower their character. Players looking for an exciting platforming challenge will want to give Starbreak a try.

Title: Fantasy Tales Online
short_description: A free-to-play, retro MMO featuring puzzles, a rich crafting system and Randomly generated dungeons!
Description:
Fantasy tales online is a free-to-play, retro MMORPG featuring puzzles, a rich crafting system and randomly generated dungeons. Developed by Cold Tea Studio, the game is current available to play for free in Early Access — although, those looking for a little more can invest in the game’s Frontier Pack for twenty bucks.

Even in Early Access, the game already boasts over 50 hour of content. All the core mechanics of the game are in place, including classes with unique builds, an item system, quests, guilds, and a party system. So Join your local player town, collect blocks to place in your home, band with friends and upgrade your home to a guild house as the base of your operations.

During the Early Access state, the developers plan to work with the players to implement all the following changes and additions.

    New boss fights requiring players to strategize to tackle large obstacles.

    Continue to raise our level cap by adding new zones, quests and unique items.

    New puzzle elements and dungeon mechanics.

    Randomly generated dungeons featuring unique monsters, bosses, traps and more…

    Elaborate expedition quest chains such as sieging instanced towns.

    Extended the crafting system recipes to allow crafting top tier items.

    Build Your Character, Home, and Unleash Your Powers.
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or equivalent with OpenGL 1.5+ Drivers

Title: Dragon Blood
short_description: A free-to-play browser MMORPG from 101XP, you'll harness your unique power and the blood of dragons that flows through your veins!
Description:
In Dragon Blood, a free-to-play browser MMORPG from 101XP, you’ll harness your unique power and the blood of dragons that flows through your veins to triumph over the forces of evil scourging the land. After emerging from a thousand-year sleep, you’ll embark on your epic journey as either an intrepid warrior or powerful mage and assemble a powerful army to fight the enemy!

Combat in Dragon Blood is turn-based, similar to many old school console RPGs. As you level, you’ll gain more abilities that you can use to take down your enemies. There are hundreds of different ways to build your character, and thousands of options to tailor your appearance to match your unique style.

You’ll also recruit several heroes to join your party, who will bring their own talents and skills to the battlefield. You’ll need to properly manage your party’s composition, to bring the best warriors into combat and make strategic decisions to succeed against waves of increasingly difficult monsters.

Dragon Blood offers plenty of content, including hundreds of quests, dungeons with challenging bosses, and weekly events, quests, and promotions. As a reward for your efforts, you’ll increase your characters’ capabilities and receive several different types of loot, up to and including fantastic dragons you can tame and have fight along your side. There are also a large number of mounts and other combat pets to acquire, so you’ll always have something new to strive for!

You can also join up with your friends to create a guild and compete with other guilds for glory. During “Best Guild” competitions, the guild that achieves the highest rating receives prizes for its members. Other events award gifts for upgrading your mounts, winning battles, or even upgrading wedding rings. Rise to the top of the rankings and make your mark as the greatest warrior in the land!

Title: League of Angels 2
short_description: A free to play browser MMORPG that captures all the beauty and elegance of its predecessor.
Description:
League of Angels 2 (LoA2) is a browser-based, free-to-play MMORPG that captures all the beauty and elegance of its predecessor with updated graphics and gameplay. Immerse yourself in LOA2’s rich story and lush graphics and fight against the forces of evil with scantily clad beautiful women by your side!

Several races exist on the blue planet Sapphire, but through their many wars and conflicts, different factions have emerged and different leaders have striven to seize power for themselves. In the present, the Tempest Kingdom, the Celestial Kingdom, and the Midas Kingdom are the three dominant powers, each run by a powerful angel who has her own idea of how they should interact with the other races, especially the humans.

As you recruit heroes to your squad, you’ll find not only that they all have unique abilities but that they work well together, offering affinity bonuses with the right combinations. Early battles are fairly simple and essentially play themselves, but later battles require greater management of your squad and good timing to maximize your damage potential.

When you win battles, you’ll receive various rewards that you can use to make your squad even better in battle, as well as fashion items and mounts that change your characters’ appearance or let them move around faster, while also providing a stat boost. You can recycle gear and even heroes you don’t want, so nothing is wasted.

League of Angels II offers many different ways to play, such as story dungeons, where you fight a series of related battles; arena PvP battles; hero trials, for ranking up your heroes rapidly; cross-server PvP wars; and elite dungeons, where the toughest enemies lie in wait. Strapped for time? There’s even an AFK Palace Dungeon where you can set up your team and let them fight of their own accord.

Title: Astral Heroes
short_description: A free-to-play collectable card game from the creators of Astral Masters.
Description:
Astral Heroes is a free-to-play collectible card game from Apus Software. The spiritual sequel to Astral Masters, Heroes features what the developers are calling a “truly fair free-to-play model,” stating the good stuff will never stuck behind a pay wall. As part of the decision to keep pay to win out of the game, the development team eliminated card rarity and made all cards equal in quality.

As with most CCG’s Astral Heroes features a variety of game modes — ranging from solo to competitive play — as well as 3 deck building modes:

    Custom Decks: Construct and play a deck of your own personal design
    Random Decks: Improvise a strategy on the fly with a deck of random cards
    Draft Tournament: Draft the cards you need before your opponents snatch them!

The game will also launch with a global “Online League” that matches people from around the world, guilds, and a series of daily quests, missions and more.

Title: Holodrive
short_description: A free-to-play 2D multiplayer shooter developed by BitCake Studio and published by Versus Evil in which players play as customizable robots or "Dummys".
Description:
Holodrive is a free-to-play 2D multiplayer shooter developed by BitCake Studio and published by Versus Evil in which players play as customizable robots or “Dummys”. The robots can be armed with a large arsenal of projectile weapons acquirable from weapon packs or via crafting. Each Dummy can carry 7 weapons at one time.

The game’s designed to have fast pased action requiring the use of strategy. It also heavily features explosions. To add to the fun, players can customize their Dummys to look like almost anything from ninjas, to cyborgs, to pirates.

Holodrive even features a unique mode called Cocoball which combines the gameplay of basketball and pinball. There are also three other modes including deathmatch.

Title: Cabal Online
short_description: A free to play fast-paced skill-based MMORPG in a stunning world!
Description:
Cabal Online is a free to play 3D MMORPG developed by the South Korean company ESTsoft. CABAL Online introduces fast-paced skill-based combat in a stunning world that blurs the line between fantasy and science fiction. The game takes place in the fictional world of Nevareth nearly a thousand years after its destruction by a group called the Cabal. The game contains PvP and PvE elements each of which will reward the player in various ways.

PvE is very well represented in Cabal Online. There is the constant grinding that will allow you to keep doing the same process over and over again slowly improving your character over time, questing which will offer multiple types of rewards and experience points, and instances that will reward you with rarer items as well as the in-game currency Alz that you can use in the in-game item shop.

If you would prefer to go the route of PvP then have no worries as there is plenty of that in Cabal Online as well. Travel around the world crushing other players while they attempt to quest and grind, arrange a duel between yourself and another player, join a nation and participate in the Mission War system that puts in you massive combat situations with other players, and don’t forget about joining and guild and battling other guilds for your place on the top of the leaderboards.
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6 series / ATI Radeon 9800 PRO

Title: Atom Universe
short_description: A free-to-play multiplayer online social Virtual World set in a theme park.
Description:
Atom Universe is a free-to-play multiplayer online social Virtual World set in a 3D theme park where players can meet and interact in a fun and thrilling carnival atmosphere.

Atom Republic has brought social Virtual World games to a whole new level, In Atom Universe, players can join together amidst the fun and whimsy of a virtual theme park with no shortage of amusements available. Classic rides abound in Atom Universe, from roller coasters and go-karts to massive multi-colored Ferris wheels. What better way to meet someone new than in an amusement park?

But amusement parks are more than rides, and Atom Universe features dozens of different mini-games to play, from classic theme park arcade standards like Whack-a-Mole to mini-golfing and bowling. And much like a certain theme park in the real world, Atom Universe is always changing and adding something new.

Players looking for fun social interaction in a theme park setting will love Atom Universe.
Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster

Title: Spellweaver
short_description:
A free-to-play multiplayer online collectible card 
game that requires deep strategic and 
thinking.
Description:
Spellweaver is a free-to-play multiplayer online collectible card game that requires deep strategic thinking and offers tons of customization options. During the course of the game, even your hero itself will undergo changes, being modified by shrine cards to acquire new and more powerful skills. Heroes will also gain levels in the six aspects of magic, allowing them to cast more powerful spells as the game goes on.

Combat in Spellweaver is about more than just having bigger creatures than your opponent. In addition to their strength, creatures have a speed ability that is crucial in combat, as they can only attack or block creatures with an equal or lower speed. There are also instant spells that can be played during combat to alter the course of battles.

Another strategic feature that’s unique to Spellweaver is the two lines of combat: front and support. Creatures on the support line can’t be directly attacked, so it’s a great place to hide weak creatures with powerful abilities, so you can let your front-line creatures soak up the damage from your enemy. In addition to great cards, you’ll need plenty of tactical know-how to succeed at Spellweaver!

There are six magical aspects in Spellweaver: Order, Wisdom, Nature, Corruption, Dominion, and Rage. Each hero starts with the ability to use cards from one of the aspects but can use any of the six in their decks, depending on how they develop themselves. There are over a dozen heroes and hundreds of cards available, offering countless options for creating a deck.

Spellweaver has multiple play modes, including matches versus AI, ranked play, drafts, and tournaments, as well as massive multiplayer events. As you play, you’ll earn currency you can use to buy new packs of cards, which you can also purchase with real money. Build your collection and join the battle for Esperia today!

Title: Clash of Avatars
short_description:
A free to play 3D browser MMORPG with powerful Avatars, 50 mounts, 
and several loyal pets.
Description:
Clash of Avatars is a free-to-play browser based 3D fantasy MMORPG from AMZGame where players create characters based on anime and cosplay. The browser MMORPG is rendered in beautiful 3D graphics, making it standout from similar Chinese browser MMORPGs.

Even though the in-game classes are limited to the Mage, Priest, and Warrior classes, Clash of Avatars features over 60 unique avatars, 10 helpful pets, and 50 reliable mounts to choose from.

Clash of Avatars will also host familiar PvE events, like challenging World Bosses or strategic Corridor Defense. In addition to that, players in Clash of Avatars will also be able to take part in PvP events, including Coliseum battles and even flag events, just to name a few. It may be early to call it, but Clash of Avatars is shaping up to be an entertaining browser MMORPG title.

Title: War Trigger 3
short_description: A MMO shooter with infantry, vehicle, and air combat across massive maps!
Description:
Blasting out of Rocketeer Games is War Trigger 3 (formerly Red Crucible: Firestorm) a free-to-play MMO shooter that pulls players into intense online matches featuring infantry, vehicle and air combat across massive maps.

Equipped with gear taken straight from modern military forces, Red Crucible: Firestorm will give players to choose their preferred fighting style from the Assault, Sniper, Support, and Demolitions classes. These weapons can be significantly upgraded as players gain experience, giving them a stronger edge over their opponents on the battlefield, especially when maps can support up to 24 players at a time.

War Trigger 3 also prominently features modern war machines in the form of tanks, helicopters, artillery platforms, anti-air vehicles, and more. These vehicles are essential for either getting quickly across the map or bringing heavy firepower down on the enemy.

Players can either play by themselves or they can join online clans to build a stronger, more effective fighting force in War Trigger 3. Teams like this can make all the difference in the wide variety of modes available in War Trigger 3, such as Survivor, Team Deathmatch, Conquer, Team Deathmatch Armored, and more.

War Trigger 3 offers much for the MMO shooter genre and will bring the pulse-pounding combat right to the player.

Title: VEGA Conflict
short_description: A Cross-Platform free to play 2D sci-fi strategy MMO.
Description:
VEGA Conflict is a Cross-Platform free to play 2D browser based sci-fi strategy MMO. VEGA Conflict requires players to take on the role of space minters and seek absolute control over the scarce resources found in the sectors’ asteroids. Available on PC, Mac, iOS and Android, VEGA Conflict allows players to obtain and manage a fleet of large, unique ships and command centers. Use your fleet to conquer the VEGA Federation, a villainous organization that seeks to acquire and utilize the sectors’ resources for themselves.

Published by KIXYE, VEGA Conflict boasts a large player base and real-time PvP combat with PVE resource gathering. Your territory may come under attack without warning, so always be prepared to defend yourself against enemy forces. You must ascertain your enemies strengths and weaknesses, and strategically contrive your fleet around them. Interact with other players by joining alliances and discuss your approach. The game also features a ship customization systems that allows players to perpetually enhance their fleets’ abilities.

Title: Metal War Online: Retribution
short_description: A high-speed multiplayer online concept car shooter game with racing elements!
Description:
Metal War Online: Retribution is a high-speed futuristic multiplayer online car shooter game with racing elements. In the future corporations around the world are involved in huge wars for resources. You will see how powerful transnational corporations are embroiled in a fierce battle for resources and the entire world will become a huge battlefield. You will choose any of the powerful war machines and will win your battles and lead your side to victory!

Developed and published by GDT Limited, and released as an Early Access title on December 11, 2015, the game centers on what the developers are referring to as “corporate wars”. Two major corporations – the Global Resource Network and Morgan Industries utilized mercenary groups, security agencies, and private armies in a war that became so large that they could no longer keep it a secret from the public.

Players take on the role of the mercenaries, using high-tech machinery in battle on behalf of the corporations. You will also be joining millions of players from around the world, so you are sure to find someone you’ll want to play with again and again. Currently there are four combat classes in the game. Your objective is simple. Just defeat your enemy, at any cost, and make it home alive! Think you can manage that? If you have a love for shooter games and fast cars, then check out Metal War Online: Retribution!
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon X2 64 3.0 GHz
Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9500GT / ATI Radeon HD 3450

Title: Immortal Empire
short_description: A free to play multiplayer strategy RPG developed by Tactic Studios.
Description:
Immortal Empire is a free to play role playing game with strategy elements, developed by Tactic Studios. Adventure as an immortal in the realm of Alvedor while discovering the secrets of the Empire. Enjoy a great multiplayer experience with your friends, and enemies, in Immortal Empire.

Control up to five different immortals in your party as you adventure through Alvedor defeating your enemies with cunning tactics. Progress your immortals by leveling them up and unlocking more powerful and unique spells. As you defeat your enemies you will find rare and powerful pieces of gear that will help to improve your immortals. If the gear you find isn’t enough, you can always create and customize your own gear with materials you find during your adventures.

Enjoy a great multiplayer experience in Immortal Empire whether you are participating in the co-op with your friends or the PvP with your enemies. The teamplay allows you to start huge wars for control in custom, objective-based game modes. Climb different ladders in ranked play in Immortal Empire, participate in quests in the co-op more or fight against other players in versus mode.

Immortal Empire is a multiplayer strategy RPG with a great amount of party customization and a good social aspect to it. It allows you to make friends and crush your enemies with its great custom teamplay mechanics.

Title: MechWarrior Online
short_description: A free-to-play PvP game that's a faithful adaptation of the popular MechWarrior strategy board games.
Description:
MechWarrior Online is Piranha Game’s free-to-play PvP game that’s a faithful adaptation of the popular BattleTech/MechWarrior strategy board games by FASA. A thousand years in the future, the Great Houses of humanity war on each other and on a common enemy, and their weapon of choice is 80-ton walking arsenals known as ‘mechs. Equip your ‘mech with the latest weapons and gear and take to the battlefield to turn your opponents into scrap metal!

After selecting your faction, your most important task as an aspiring ‘mech pilot is to choose the chassis of your ‘mech. From light scouts to heavy assault ‘mechs, each ‘mech has its own specialty and role on the battlefield. Some are better at close-quarters fighting, while other excel at long range or quick-hitting attacks, unable to sustain long-term encounters. Once you’ve chosen a ‘mech chassis, it’s time to kit it out. The weight of equipment and its power consumption are factors you must balance to ensure that your ‘mech can continue to move and fight in long battles.

There are several match types: Conquest (victory points), Assault (capture the base), Skirmish (deathmatch), and Invasion (attack/defend), which can be contested on one of over a dozen maps. In addition to one-off matches, MechWarrior Online has Faction Play, which pits the various factions against each other for control of the Inner Sphere.

As you complete matches, you’ll earn C-bills, which you can use to buy more equipment for your ‘mech, or entirely new ‘mechs. Some equipment can only be purchased with ‘mech credits, which are awarded in smaller amounts in certain matches or bought with real money. Finally, the ‘mechs themselves earn ‘mech XP, which can be used to unlock additional capabilities and skills for the ‘mechs. There are many ways to play MechWarrior Online, so the key is finding the strategies and equipment that work the best for you.
Processor: Intel: Core 2 Duo E7300 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD: Athlon 64 X2 6400+ @ 3.2GHz

Title: Armored Warfare
short_description: A modern team-based MMO tank game from Obsidian Entertainment.
Description:
Armored Warfare is a free to play 3D team-based MMO tank game from Obsidian Entertainment where you control combat vehicles from the 1950s all the way to modern day vehicles.  It is set in the modern day and is heavily focused on PvP, but it does have a selection of PvE game modes.

You can choose to play with one of five different classes: Main Battle Tanks, Light Tanks, Tank Destroyers, Armored Fighting Vehicles and Self-Propelled Guns. Each of the different classes comes with many different combat vehicles and many different combat styles.

The games main focus is PvP it does have a PvE side to it as well.  The PvE side of the game is split into two different categories during the missions: Primary and secondary. The Primary Objectives are things that you have to complete during the mission, with your co-op team, to successfully finish the mission. The Secondary Objectives do not have to be completed but they will offer you and your team a bigger reward if completed.

The PvP consists of two teams with 15 players each all of them using different vehicles and different classes of vehicles during the match. Players are thrown into a 15-minute match in which they have two different means to when the battle. They can either destroy all of the enemy team’s vehicles or capture the enemy base during those 15-minutes.

The game boasts great graphics powered by the CryENGINE 3 with destructible terrain. In its current state the game has nine different maps that take you from frozen tundras to sun-scorched deserts as well as doing battle around oil refineries and large population centers.

Armored Warfare is a large action packed game with modern graphics that you can spend hours upon hours playing and upgrading your different vehicles and crews while enjoying either PvE or PvP.

Armored Warfare is a large action packed game with modern graphics that you can spend hours upon hours playing and upgrading your different vehicles and crews while enjoying either PvE or PvP.

Title: America’s Army: Proving Grounds
short_description: Take a first person shooter, have the game developed by the U.S. Army and you’ve got America’s Army.
Description:
America’s Army: Proving Grounds is a free to play military online FPS game. Take a first person shooter, add in Rules of Engagement and other Army codes, have the game developed by the U.S. Army and you’ve got America’s Army: Proving Grounds. While America’s Army is designed to be a fun game, it also serves as a bit of a recruiting tool for the U.S. Army and adds elements of Army training, core values, and a focus on teamwork to the mix.

Detailed environments and diverse maps make America’s Army a very popular free-to-play shooter. Supporting multiple games modes that include 6v6, 12v12, and other game types adds a bit of diversity between each match that keeps players engaged. Securing downed enemies adds to the feel of realism and since points are awarded for actions such a providing cover or suppression fire, America’s Army forces players to rely on the unit as a whole rather than a single player. One lone gunman is not likely to last very long against a team.

If you enjoyed the offline games or just want to take a dive into a shooter game with a bit more focus on teamwork and strategy, America’s Army: Proving Grounds has a large enough player base to keep you earning experience and upgrading your tactics and weapons for quite some time.
Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compliant, Shader 3.0 enabled video card with 512MB RAM

Title: One Piece Online 2
short_description: A free-to-play, browser-based 2D MMORPG based on the immensely popular One Piece franchise.
Description:
One Piece Online 2: Pirate King is a free-to-play, browser-based 2D MMORPG based on the immensely popular One Piece franchise that follows Luffy and his friends on his quest to become the Pirate King. In this turn-based game, players initially meet their guides, some of the more popular One Piece characters, and set off to find Luffy. Players can then recruit additional One Piece characters in the game’s tavern, the goal being to form an effective, balanced team from a wide pool of characters.

The game begins at a character select screen that features four gender-locked classes: sailor, dark mage, sniper and doctor. The sailor is a swordsman and an expert in striking multiple enemies and once, and providing protection for himself and the rest of the crew. The dark mage uses element magic and hypnotism to attack and control opponents. She can also use her abilities to determine enemy weaknesses and enhance her own abilities. The sniper lacks defensive capabilities, but is an expert in firearms and can do massive damage to single enemies from great distances. The doctors is skilled at healing his team members and poisoning enemies.

The combat system is mostly automated, and offers a variety of PvP and PvE features including Elite Battles and Devil Oars. Elite Battles are activated based on character levels; the first starts at level 30. Players are rewarded based on their performance in the challenge. In Devil Oars, multiple players gather in the Thriller Bark Mansion to battle the Devil Oars together. Should they succeed, they are handsomely rewarded. Players can also complete certain tasks daily for a reward.

Title: Otherland
short_description: A free-to-play MMO based on the popular novels by Tad Williams.
Description:
Otherland is a free-to-play MMO based on the popular novels by Tad Williams. Developed by Drago Entertainment and published by Gamigo, Otherland allows players to explore the vast virtual worlds.

Like the books, the game is set in the late 21st century — when virtual reality has advanced so far that full-immersion installations are widely available. The game takes place after control of Otherland is taken over by new owners who are determined to eliminate the villainy that ruled it before.

Otherland is a free-to-play MMO based on the popular novels by Tad Williams. Developed by Drago Entertainment and published by Gamigo, Otherland allows players to explore the vast virtual worlds.

Like the books, the game is set in the late 21st century — when virtual reality has advanced so far that full-immersion installations are widely available. The game takes place after control of Otherland is taken over by new owners who are determined to eliminate the villainy that ruled it before.

The game features four playable classes: Marskman, Warrior, Assassin and Energizer. The first three classes are similar to their counterparts in other MMOs. Engergizer, on the other hand, is a gun wielding type specific to Otherland. This class makes use of the Otherland powergrid to deal damage. They feature weapons such as the Beam and Pulse gun.

Built in Unreal Engine 3, Otherland offers a wide variety of character customization, player housing, PvP, and PvE. There are nine different “world simulations” — Otherland’s version of regions — all with different styles. These range from the Lambda Mall, which functions as a type of hub and exists outside the network itself, to Earth’s nearest neighbor Mars, and a world dedicated to testing the behavior of insects.

Otherland is playable via gamigo’s web portal or through Steam.

Built in Unreal Engine 3, Otherland offers a wide variety of character customization, player housing, PvP, and PvE. There are nine different “world simulations” — Otherland’s version of regions — all with different styles. These range from the Lambda Mall, which functions as a type of hub and exists outside the network itself, to Earth’s nearest neighbor Mars, and a world dedicated to testing the behavior of insects.

Otherland is playable via gamigo’s web portal or through Steam.

Title: Forza Motorsport 6: Apex
short_description: A free-to-play MMO racing game that comes from makers of one of the most popular video game racing series ever.
Description:
Forza Motorsport 6: Apex is a free-to-play multiplayer online racing game that comes from makers of one of the most popular video game racing series ever. It marks the first entry for the series on PC, after a decade on consoles. Microsoft and Turn 10 Studios bring the gameplay of Forza Motorsport 6 to Windows 10 machines with a many of the same features as its paid console counterpart.

Forza Motorsport 6 offers over 450 cars and 26 tracks, offering one of the most realistic racing experiences you can get in a video game. Races can have up to 24 players, competing on tracks found throughout the world and hand-crafted with exacting detail. Cars in the game include some of the most popular sports cars in the world, including the Lamborghini Huracan and the Ferrari 458 Italia. Tracks include such famous locales as the Indianapolis Motor Speedway, Nurburgring, and Watkins Glen.

The level of detail is astounding, from realistic damage modeling that gives you an idea of the wear and tear that your vehicle goes through, to spectacular weather effects, to dirt and grass modeling that will have you thinking you’re watching a race on TV. You can compete against human opponents or against the AI, which uses Forza’s innovative Drivatar technology to deliver an experience that’s as close to competition against real people as you can get.

Though Forza Motorsport 6: Apex does have microtransactions, it will not have a VIP Pass in the same fashion as its console counterpart. Microtransactions in Apex focus on letting players avoid the most unpleasant parts of progression while not giving a competitive edge in the races themselves. The game is the first part of Microsoft’s refocusing on PC gaming, after spending over a decade concentrating on Xbox and Xbox One as the company’s primary gaming platform.
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740 AMD Radeon R7 250X

Title: Legends of Honor
short_description: A free to play browser based medieval fantasy 2D MMORTS.
Description:
Legends of Honor is a free to play browser based medieval fantasy MMORTS. Strengthen your defenses, improve your castle, and send your heroes to do battle in Legends of Honor, a 2D strategy MMO game from Goodgame Empire.

Manage your resources and build your city walls to defend against attackers in Legends of Honor in any way you want. Your city’s survival depends on you and your strategy so make it count.

Of course, Legends of Honor also allows you to recruit heroes to your cause and to send them as part of your troops out into the wilderness to vanquish marauders and defend against encroaching threats, not the least of which is other players looking to expand their own territories.

Players can also ally themselves with one another in Legends of Honor, with the option to join one of three factions with names meant in homage to Game of Thrones writer George R.R. Martin.

Exploration and innovation are well rewarded in Legends of Honor, but only if you take that step and begin building your empire strongly from the ground up.

Title: Felspire
short_description: A free-to-play 2D browser-based fantasy MMORPG with plenty of dungeons and world bosses to slay.
Description:
Felspire is a free-to-play 2D browser-based fantasy MMORPG published by 37Games. Choose between Archer, Mage, and Warrior as you enter the realm of Eremos

Players will arrive in a world where a portal known as the Felspire connects the world and the underworld, leaving mankind open to the vicious machinations of monsters. Your quest hinges on fighting these beasts and saving mankind from their horrors.

Though Felspire only has three classes, players can specialize their roles in each one multiple times in order to create their own unique character and abilities. Countless collectibles ranging from specialized mounts to impressive titles ensure that no two player characters are ever truly alike.

Felspire boasts the feature of keeping the automated gameplay system on at all times after the player’s second class advancement. This means that the player’s character is always grinding and gaining experience.

Players in Felspire can also join forces in guilds to tackle special obstacles in Multiplayer PvE challenges and quests. And when they tire of their companions, they can duel them in the PvP Battleground that will help players climb the ranks of the game’s top spots.

Even with its heavy emphasis on automated gameplay, Felspire is still a enjoyable browser MMORPG.

Title: WARMODE
short_description: A Free to play multiplayer online shooter. Sight in enemies to master Headshots, Double Kills and Triple Kills!
Description:
Imagine this you are stuck in a world defined by two confrontational, irreconcilable sides; represented by the government military housings, and the armed hirelings. Try your hand at virtual battles with fast paced gameplay and off-scale dynamics in the spirit of all classic shooter games before. This game is WARMODE, and it’s available in a wide range of maps and includes several modes. The game’s level system allows for players to open achievements, weapons, stickers and more!

The free to play FPS WARMODE was developed and published by WARTEAM offers stunning graphics as you venture through multiple maps, killing anyone in sight. You will need to be accurate , since everyone else is out to kill you as well. Sight in enemies to master Headshots, Double Kills and Triple Kills, as you rack up points, and become the most deadly of them all.

WARMODE may remind you of Team Deathmatch modes in games like Call of Duty or Counter-Strike: Global Offensive ­you’ll run around maps with the sole objective being to take down your enemies, while managing to stay alive. The game offers in-­game leader boards, so you will always know how is on top (and who you need to take down, in order to claim that top stop!).

The game features a very active online community, allowing you to make friends, ask for help and team up to take the enemy down! To help in this quest, the game offers an impressive arsenal of weapons you can take down enemies at close range, with shotguns, or hold back and pop head shots with an assortment of sniper rifles. You will fight across visually distinct and congested maps, where other players are forced into tight corners ­ demanding a quick trigger finger to survive. Customize your character with an assortment of cosmetic items, such as masks, and banners, which will help to distinguish yourself on the battlefield.

Title: Sphere 3: Enchanted World
short_description: A fantasy action MMORPG with a non-target combat system.
Description:
Sphere III: Enchanted World is a 3D fantasy action MMORPG that was published by Nikita Online. Use the game’s unique non-target combat system and participate in the PvP that is a strong focus in Sphere III.

As you play Sphere III you will quickly learn that the combat does not auto-aim for you. You will have to manually aim your attacks using the color-coded crosshairs on your screen to determine the best skills to use against your enemies. This is particularly difficult when you are participating in the PvP servers where player’s will move much more erratically than an AI opponent. Careful killing to many players though, the game’s Karma System will make you lose gold and even items if you get killed and have a low Karma.

Once you get bored with the thousands of quests that Sphere III offers you may decide to start participating in Castle Sieges. Castle Sieges offer you the chance to take over castle and make them your own. If you end up controlling at castle this is the best way to earn some of the greatest items in Sphere III.

Sphere III: Enchanted World features a great non-target combat system that provides freedom of aiming, dynamically calculates the damage and allows a player to quickly pick an optimum attacking ability, offering players something to develop their skills with. You can also participate in Castle Sieges to earn the best items in the game and make your Karma go up or down while participating in the PvP.
Os: Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7,8,8.1 (32 or 64-bit)
Graphics: Shader 3.0 support Geforce 6600, Radeon X1600, 256 Mb RAM and DirectX 9.0c support

Title: Fishing Planet
short_description: A Free to play realistic online first-person multiplayer fishing simulator!
Description:
The core focus of Fishing Planet is providing players with a peaceful environment that they can relax in while waiting for that big catch. With seven locations and an array of weather conditions to take advantage of, Fishing Planet offers a unique experience in player interaction.

Fishing Planet also gives players a massive selection of equipment to choose from. Players can customize their gear to suit their fishing style and watch as their catch count rises.

And don’t worry about Fishing Planet featuring just one generic type of fish. There are 32 species of fish available to catch in all of the various locations, each one requiring different baits and tactics.

Sport fishing wouldn’t be competitive without a leaderboard, and Fishing Planet pits players across the internet against one another to see who can catch “the big one” and take first place.

Fishing Planet promises a relaxing atmosphere and a competitive challenge to players looking to ease into a game.
Os: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7
Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4000 or higher

Title: Aberoth
short_description: A free to play 8-bit MMORPG with retro graphics and MUD-like interface.
Description:
Adventure, magic, and fantasy await you in Aberoth, a free-to-play MMORPG crafted in the retro graphics of days gone by! Don’t let the graphics fool you, though, for Aberoth offers much to players who dare to embark on the path it offers.

Aberoth brings a unique take to the MMORPG market, and not just because of its retro graphic style. Players have almost total freedom within the game right from the beginning (starting out in an Orc prison cell aside). If you’re not interested in battling fierce monsters or questing through the varied lands within the game, you are more than welcome to fight other players within the game world with all of the skills and items you possess.

But be warned! Your enemies are crafty as well, and they will not hesitate to pick up items and scrolls cast aside in order to defeat you. From the thieves of Rogue’s Den to skeletons of the Desert Tomb, enemies lie in wait all throughout Aberoth, waiting to challenge your skills.

Perhaps the greatest asset of Aberoth is that it plays well even on the lowest system. No software upgrades or downloads required to engage in this unrestricted MMORP world of magic and fantasy. There is always a quest to be completed and special events are announced regularly.

Escape the Orc Prison and begin your path to greatness within the realms of Aberoth!

Title: Codename CURE
short_description: A free to play 3D MMOFPS featuring cooperative play, and objective-based missions.
Description:
The undead prowl the maps in search of flesh in Codename CURE, a free to play MMOFPS with objective based missions set against the backdrop of a zombie apocalypse.

Taking a leaf from Team Fortress 2’s book, Codename CURE gives players access to five different classes to play as, each with their own strengths and weakness against the zombie hordes. Players will mow down legions of the undead with weapons unique to each class in heart-pounding FPS combat.

Players will also be introduced to massive in-game maps in Codename CURE, forcing them to think tactically about how they will defend against the lurking zombies. Each map has its own objectives which must be completed if the team is going to survive to see the end of this nightmare.

Only the strong will survive and end the zombie outbreak in Codename CURE, and everyone has their own role to play.

Title: Skyforge
short_description: A impressive Free to play MMORPG where you can become a god!
Description:
Skyforge is a impressive Free to play MMORPG created by Obsidian Entertainment and Mail.ru group’s Allods Team. Skyforge puts you in the shoes of an Immortal wielding amazing powers, with the mission of protecting your world against hordes of creatures hell-bent on seeing the destruction of your planet. Will you be able to defeat the armies of other Gods, and finally reach of title of a God for yourself?

Skyforge’s class system is completely versatile, allowing you to switch between classes seamlessly, as long as you are not currently in combat. You don’t start out with all 13 classes, but you are able to unlock the other 10 classes simply by progressing through the game. Some of the classes available are Cryomancer and Lightbinder.

You can complete quests through the Divine Observatory, visit the Research Center in order to alter your character and train/test new classes and you can visit the Park which allows you to Host and partake is events. All of this is available from the hub world, which is also the capital of Aelion. Every part of Aelion is explore-able, resulting in loads of content.

Skyforge rocks stunning visuals and top tier graphics, provides a huge selection of weapons, including guns and swords, and has a fantastically built progression system called the “Ascension Atlas”. This replaces the normal leveling platform and switches it for a Prestige system found in a lot of FPS titles like COD. This allows for the fluid class changes.
Graphics: GeForce 8600 GTS, Intel HD 3000, Radeon HD 4650 or better

Title: Card Hunter
short_description: A free online collectible card game which blends together role-playing, card play and tactical combat.
Description:
Tabletop gaming shall never be forgotten so long as Card Hunter is there to defend it! From developer Blue Manchu, this free-to-play online RPG and strategy game combines the familiar dice, cards, and miniatures of traditional tabletop gaming with the fast pace and vast community of the internet.

Assemble your team and build your deck before you venture out onto the grid-based battlefields of Card Hunter, preparing to face strange beasts and hazardous enemies, all under the watchful of the powerful and wise Game Master, Gary.

Card Hunter teaches you to adapt your strategies for turn-based combat and ready your card deck to achieve victory against your foes and claim vast treasures and new cards carrying powerful abilities and items.

Invite your friends to join your endless quests in Card Hunter, building your team to support one another in order to overcome the foes that lie before you on the path to glory.

And if you’re looking for further challenges, Card Hunter gives you the chance to engage other players in everything from friendly challenges to intense league matches where rivalries thrive. Climb the month’s season and let all who dare to challenge you know that you are a master of Card Hunter.

Though Card Hunter requires 300 MB of available storage, it is well worth the adventures and quests this game will bring you. Begin your hunt for fun and glory with Card Hunter today!
Processor: 2.33 Ghz or faster x86-compatible processor or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz

Title: Fallout Shelter
short_description: A free-to-play simulation game based on Bethesda Game Studios' popular Fallout franchise.
Description:
Fallout Shelter is a free-to-play simulation game based on Bethesda Game Studios’ popular Fallout franchise. Originally released as a mobile game, the game became popular enough that Bethesda decided to release a version for PC.

As with most sim games, Fallout Shelter requires the player to take care and manage a small society of people known as “Dwellers.” This is done by meeting their needs, food, water, power, etc. Dwellers can be made useful to the vault society by managing their stats and training them for specific things. Characters with high stats in specific things will be able to generate higher amounts of resources for the community. In addition, the community is grown by either waiting for new people to arrive or by pairing a male and female dweller to create children.

Players can build a wide variety of rooms for the vault dwellers to use; everything from rooms to generate resources, to training rooms, and recreational areas.

Another feature of Fallout Shelter is exploration. Players can send dwellers into the wasteland on missions and to seek out new locations. Of course, these dwellers should be properly trained and geared, or they won’t last long.

Title: Lord’s Road
short_description: A free-to-play 2D browser-based fantasy MMORPG that features two playable classes.
Description:
Lord’s Road is a free-to-play 2D browser-based fantasy MMORPG that features two playable classes. While some players may call its simple two-class system (Warrior and Mage) limiting, many players enjoy the fresh challenge that Lord’s Road has placed before them.

This chinese browser MMORPG sets itself apart from most conventions of the genre by making its AFK mode only available to premium members. This decision forces players who do not wish to pay to accomplish character grinding and dungeon crawling the old-fashioned way: by actually playing the game. That may sound like a turn-off for some people, but gamers who love MMORPG combat will surely love this feature.

Players can also enlist the help of one of the nine goddesses in Lord’s Road, bringing her into combat where she will prove to be an invaluable asset with helpful hints.

Lord’s Road also allows players to engage one another in PvP combat, both 1v1 and guild battles where players will fight for the highest rankings among one another.

Let the goddesses guide you as you fight your way through Lord’s Road. They may even help you find many of the collectibles that can improve and enhance your in-game abilities.

Title: Salem
short_description: A free-to-play, sandbox type MMO based on the times and trials of living.
Description:
Salem is a free-to-play, sandbox crafting MMORPG based on the times and trials of living in 17th Century New England. You know, a time when people were burnt at the stack for being a witch. In this version though, witchcraft and other things occult are very real and can pose quite a threat to your basic survival. And that’s what the game is mainly about: Survival. You’ll take on the role of a puritanical settler that crafts, gathers, and builds their way to a better life….well first you’ll be just trying to survive long enough to get some food, some water, and maybe a crude shelter.

While the city of Providence is a safe zone (allowing players to meet up, trade, buy items, and not have to worry about death, everything beyond its borders is wilderness that can be fully developed by players who can alter the game’s landscape permanently. Your specific character doesn’t have a pore-define role, either. Become what you want to become by mastering a plethora of skills and trades. Build things, combat threats, or hell, even dabble in a bit of Alchemy or Goat Rearing (yes, that’s a viable skill.)

Be careful though, outside the walls of Providence, anything goes. Since Salem features a permadeath mechanic, players will want to take their time before venturing too far. Skilling up a bit, discovering a few things you can make or build, and generally making some friends might be a huge boost to players right off the bat.

Salem’s art style is a bit unique and certainly won’t appeal to everyone. For the most part, the game adopts an isometric viewpoint similar to ARPGs like Path of Exile. The graphics themselves are quite simple and straight forward, even if they don’t tip the scales of realism in any way.

With innumerable materials, crafting combinations, and the challenge of in-game death ever-present, Salem offers a unique contribution to the sandbox MMORPG genre. Salem is developed by Mortal Moments and published by Paradox Interactive
Os: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7
Processor: Celeron E1500 Dual-Core 2.2GHz or Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4800+

Title: Heroes of the Storm
short_description: A free to play MOBA developed by Blizzard Entertainment.
Description:
Heroes of the Storm is a free to play Multiplayer Online Battle Arena (MOBA) developed by Blizzard Entertainment. Heroes of the Storm is an extremely well-polished MOBA that utilizes many assets from past Blizzard games.

Choose from many different Heroes that are present throughout the Blizzard universes. Heroes from StarCraft like Artanis and Tychus, Heroes from Warcraft such as Lunara and Cho’Gall, Heroes from Diablo like Kharazim or The Butcher, and you can even choose from retro Heroes from past Blizzard games like the Lost Vikings.

Battle on five versus five battlegrounds each with different objectives, but the ultimate objective always being destroying your enemies core. Everyone chooses different Heroes that they will level up together as the game progresses choosing new talents at levels 1, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, and 20. The great thing about being able to choose different talents at so many levels and competing in 5 v 5 situations is that virtually no game will ever turn out the same.

Get randomly placed in one of 10 different battlegrounds with objectives that vary from delivering coins to a pirate to blast your opponent’s core to battling angels and demons that will push down lanes and destroy your opponent’s structures.

Heroes of the storm is a MOBA that is extremely well-polished and competes very well against all others MOBAs on the market. Choose from a great selection of Heroes from a fantastic set of universes and battle on many iconic battlegrounds.
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 7600 GT / ATI Radeon 2600 XT

Title: Dirty Bomb
short_description: A free-to-play first person shooter multiplayer game set in a post-apocalyptic London.
Description:
Dirty Bomb, formerly developed under the title Extraction, is a free-to-play MMOFPS developed by Splash Damage and published by Nexon. Set in a post-apocalyptic London, Dirty Bomb boasts a “higher skill ceiling” than other free-to-play shooters in that controllers are not natively supported and no auto aim or aim assist system is used forcing players to develop faster reactions and strategies through gameplay.

Dirty Bomb’s classes work in the form of “Mercs,” mercenaries that have various skill sets that range from being able to drop turrets to calling in orbital laser strikes. Players are allowed to select multiple Mercs before a match and swap between them between deaths as needed. Currently there are three primary gameplay modes in Dirty Bomb. Objective mode challenges both team to meet various objectives on the map and the match timer has time added as each objective is met. Stopwatch mode is a variation on Objective mode except this time, each team is given a chance to both attack and then defend the objectives. The fastest time overall wins. Finally, Execution mode. This mode is straight forward: Eliminate the opposing team or blow up the objective.

Dirty Bomb’s 5 maps can support up to 8v8 gameplay and the 18 available Mercs (as of this writing) offer a fair amount of diversity, speed, abilities, and usefulness in the game. The game also features the use of a card system to augment Merc loadouts. New players will want to search out a guide for their Merc of choice as this system, while explained, does require a bit of guidance.

Dirty Bomb’s system specs are a tad higher since the game environment is nicely detailed and player reports indicate that game performance may suffer on lower end machines.

Title: Vikings: War Of Clans
short_description: A free-to-play MMO strategy game developed and published by Plarium.
Description:
Vikings: War of Clans is a 3D free-to-play browser based strategy game developed and published by Plarium. Originally developed for mobile devices, the game is now available on PC. It is a multiplayer game in which player form their own clans, train troops and build their society.

In Vikings, players can team up into clans of 100 people in order to achieve goals and help each other. They can also work together to obtain the resources necessary to maintain buildings and upgrade troops. Players are separated geographically into different locations known as kingdoms with each kingdom housing around 45,000 players.

As one might expect from the name Vikings is based on Scandinavian history, with the developers taking their lead from TV shows and movies as well as other sources containing information on Scandinavian culture.

Title: Star Trek: Alien Domain
short_description: A free to play browser based 2D strategy MMO set in the Stark Trek universe.
Description:
Star Trek: Alien Domination is a free to play browser based 2D strategy MMO set in the Stark Trek universe. Players must choose between siding with the Klingon Empire or the United Federation of Planets. Each faction offers unique artwork, officers and ships to take you on alien-killing adventures. The United Federation of Planets has access to Constitution-class and Defiant-class starships, while the Klingon faction offers D7 Battle Cruisers and Birds of Prey.

Players can also create ships new to the Stark Trek universe by researching emerging technologies. The browser-based strategy game boasts a new Star Trek story and requires players to construct bases to obtain resources and research emerging technologies to amass a diverse fleet of ships to make you a formidable alien killer and universe dominator.

Set in the realm of fluidic space, Star Trek: Alien Domination offers a medium player base and some customization, in that you can build various upgradeable structures to gain access to different skill trees. Players must strategically exercise resource-management skills to maintain and expand their colonies. The game also offers both PvP and PvE options. PvP ranges from one-on-one fights to massive guild-against-guild fights. Colonize available planets and defend your colonies against attacks from other players in turn-based online strategy duels.

Title: Block N Load
short_description: A free-to-play multiplayer online shooter game that looks like a mix of Minecraft and Team Fortress 2.
Description:
Block N Load is a free-to-play multiplayer online FPS game developed by Jagex that looks like a mix of Minecraft and Team Fortress 2.

Get ready for the ultimate in multiplayer online gaming; you’ll face off in battles of 5v5, where everything you build, destroy, construct or shoot at has a devastating impact on the entire game. In Block N Load, you will build your defenses, using a crazy range of block types and work together with your teammates to defeat your enemy in battles that are completely unique ­ no two are ever the same!

Block N Load offers an ever­ changing gameplay experience that evolves through every match, as players creatively build and tunnel their way to enemy holds, battling their way to victory. Your characters are always different as well, as Block N Load allows you to choose from a variety of different characters with a robust mix of roles for full combat, defensive and supportive positions within your team. But don’t think a strong character with good looks will always come out on top. Brains are just as important as Brawn here on Block N Load, since every game blends intelligence and creativity with strategic action. Even though Block N Load is fast paced, make sure to take your time building your defenses. Experiment to see what works, and set up your traps and defenses before the real action begins.

Block N Load features many different block varieties, including big bombs, turrets, bounce pads, poison traps, landmines, force fields, speed pads, mortars, glue blocks, health blocks, ammo blocks, and more. You’ll have everything you need to set up the ultimate battle ground. Just make sure to think things through so you’re able to get the ultimate combination of helpful­ to­ you and deadly ­to them! You can even set up your own private game servers that allow you to choose your favorite map and build time. The possibilities are endless when you play Block N Load.
Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo or Athlon X2) or better
Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (NVidia GeForce 8800 GT or better)

Title: Survarium
short_description: A free to play post-apocalyptic online FPS game.
Description:
Survarium, is a free to play post-apocalyptic multiplayer online first-person shooter (MMOFPS) game with a fun perspective in the growing survival gaming series. With apocalyptic locations spanning from London to Rundya in the Chernobyl area and active player influenced story development, you will be inching to find out the secrets of the Forest.

Experience total freedom of action in the way you build up your character with two different directions with multiple perks available. Choose one of four factions to join: Scavengers, The Renaissance army, Black Market, and The Fringe Settlers. Each Faction has their own unique set of weapons and equipment available through their merchants. You must prove yourself worthy of joining the faction by completing missions; which allows your character to gain reputation, experience, and money.

Realistic Combat Experience is what the developers have aimed for and achieved. There’s a huge selection of realistic modifiable weapons with a variety of ammo types available, as well as traps, artifacts, and more to help you dominate in game. Currently there is only 3 PvP (8v8) Play modes: Team Deathmatch, Research (Control point capture), and Battery Retrieval (capture the flag). There is also The Last Stand mode where the last player standing wins. And a Free Play Mode which combines elements of research, confrontation between players, and survival in a hostile world. This game holds a lot of potential and will undoubtedly provide you hours of fun.

The world we used to know is no more. Years of technologic advancement and pollution has finally caught up with the human race, resulting in a viral pandemic which killed billions of people. Nature started to take back the planet, and now most of the land is cover by anomaly Forest. Humanity still survives in places where the Forest hasn’t rooted yet. You are one of those survivors fighting with your faction to stay alive in this forsaken land.
Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Phenom II X4 / AMD FX / AMD Ryzen
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce: GTX 650 / GT 1030 or Radeon R7 250X

Title: Dungeon Fighter Online
short_description: A free to play arcade-style side-scrolling action game mixed with RPG elements.
Description:
Dungeon Fighter Online is a 2D free to play multiplayer arcade-style beat’em up game developed by Neople. It features 2D side-scrolling action fighting with some roleplaying elements including, along with multiple unique classes and some PvP.

In Dungeon Fighter Online you will traverse the game fighting hordes of monsters trying to keep you HP and MP meter high as you battle your way to the more difficult stages of the game. You HP meter will decrease as you get hit and your MP meter will decrease as you use your skills.

When you begin your beat’em up experience you can choose from several different classes. You can choose from the Male Slayer, Blade Master, Soul Bender, Berserker, Asura, Female Slayer, Sword Master, Dark Templar, Demon Slayer, Vagabond, Male Gunner, Ranger, Mechanic, Spitfire, Launcher, Female Mage, Elementalist, Summoner, Battle Mage, and Witch. Each of these classes has very unique abilities and gear that you can customize as you adventure through the world.

The combat in Dungeon Fighter Online can be either passive or active. All of the classes have abilities that you can choose to either let active on their own, which will make them cost a lot of MP, or you can choose to activate them yourself, which will make the MP cost of the ability go down.

Title: Grimoire: Manastorm
short_description: A free-to-play multiplayer FPS... with wizards.
Description:
Grimoire: Manastorm is a free-to-play multiplayer FPS… with wizards. Rather than arming players with guns and ammo, they’re given unique spells.

The game offers players six classes to chose from and boasts thousands of potential spell loadouts. Players will need to have a sound understanding of their character’s abilities in order to compete. Even more, they’ll need to know how to counter their opponents abilities.

The classes offered are Fire, Lightning, Earth, Ice, Nature, and Neather. Each has their own book of spells and can be adjusted to suit each individual player’s style. There are two multiplayer modes that can be played across 12 settings.

The game is free-to-play, and offers two rotating classes that can be used at any time. Classes and spells can be unlocked by purchasing them or spending points earned in game.
Os: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only), Windows Vista, Windows 7

Title: StarColony
short_description: A free-to-play browser MMO strategy game that puts you in command of a rapidly growing city on a dangerous alien world.
Description:
StarColony is a free-to-play browser MMO space strategy game that puts you in command of a rapidly growing city on a dangerous alien world. After the last war on Earth, humanity has found a new home on the planet of Terra Sperata. But the conflicts of the past have followed the colonists across the vastness of space, and they continue to fight each other for the world’s valuable resources. Worse, a race of hostile aliens, the Swarm, are bent on destroying all humans. It’s a race for survival, and the stakes couldn’t be higher.

Your colony begins with just a few buildings, which you can arrange in any configuration you want. Later, this will become important, because strategic placement of your defenses is key to fending off attacks. You’ll start out by collecting basic resources, such as minerals and gas, which you can use to create more buildings, which will produce units you can take into combat, and you’ll receive quests from various NPCs that you can fulfill to receive rewards to help your colony grow even faster.

In addition to regular units, you can also recruit heroes, individual characters with special abilities that you acquire in a number of different ways. Once you’re ready, you can embark on a series of missions where you send out your units and heroes to explore Terra Sperata to confront aliens and pirates. If you’re up for an even greater challenge, you can attack your fellow colonists, plundering their resources to use for your own.

Once you’ve established yourself on Terra Sperata, you can establish a colony on another planet, Etter Syra, which has a different resource mix and new lands to conquer. Join a clan to form defensive alliances with other players and lead your armies into battle and emerge as the unquestioned ruler of the star system!

Title: One Piece Online
short_description: One Piece Online is a 2D Tower Defense Action MMO!
Description:
Set in the ever popular world of Shonen Jump’s One Piece, One Piece Online is a 2D Tower Defense Action MMORPG that will let players take part in the universe of the beloved anime & manga series. Combining elements of tower defense games with traditional RPGs has created a unique game that many players can enjoy.

Keeping with the theme of its namesake, One Piece Online splits players into one of three classes: Sniper, Swordsman, or Devil Fruit User. Each class has its own unique abilities and style of combat. Players will also be able to recruit familiar characters from the world of One Piece in order to aid them in battle.

One Piece Online also makes use of an auto-play mechanic, meaning that players can let their characters grind even while their away from the game. This can be a useful tool for players with limited time on their hands. Players can also engage in a wide variety of single-player and PvP modes that offer hours of entertainment.

With the only downside being pay to win elements, One Piece Online is a fun game that fans of the series will undoubtedly enjoy.

Title: Transformice
short_description: A cute little free-to-play MMO platformer.
Description:
Transformice is a cute little free-to-play massively multiplayer platformer from French developer Atelier 801 that puts you and a bunch of your closest friends – or maybe enemies – on a quest for cheese. Each level consists of a piece of cheese and a hole to serve as a start and end point. Players have two minutes to get to the cheese and get back to the hole, jockeying for position with other mice along the way. In addition to pits, ledges, and other difficult-to-reach places, some levels include elements with physics-based properties, such as bridges that wobble and snap if too many mice are on it.

One mouse on each level is the shaman, who has mystical powers that allow him to place elements in the world to (theoretically) help all mice reach the cheese. He can bridge gaps or build ramps to help, and the more mice who reach the cheese on his watch, the faster he progresses up the shaman skill tree to learn even more impressive talents. But a poor shaman can also just get in the way, “accidentally” blocking off areas and leading mice to their doom.

With seven game modes, hundreds of official maps, and millions of player-created maps, no two rounds of Transformice are ever exactly the same. The cash shop consists of only one type of item – hats – which have no gameplay benefits and can be earned in-game, though be warned: Some are incredibly difficult to obtain!

There’s even an adorable cartoon show based on the game that you can view on the website or via the Transformice YouTube channel. In the end, don’t be be fooled by Transformice’s cutesy graphics and theme – as one player puts it, it’s not a kids’ game, but a game you win with “the blood of the other mice you need to trample over to get the cheese and get to the goal to see your wife and family.”

Title: Gear Up
short_description: Control your unique tank or robot in multiplayer arcade action!
Description:
Gear Up is a free to play multiplayer arcade action game with tanks and robots. Vehicular combat is fun, and Gear Up is no exception to that. From Doctor Entertainment AB, Gear Up puts players in massive arena-style matches that can support up to 16 players in a single match. With gameplay built around an arcade-style mechanic, players will find Gear Up easy to learn and riotously fun to play.

The key to Gear Up is customization. Players can customize their bots however they want and jump into the action right away. The in-game currency allows players to purchase a variety of deadly weapons and movement types in order to best their enemies in frantic bot on bot combat.

Gear Up features four game modes that ensure the fun never ends. Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Tag, and Conquest all promise furious bot combat between players armed with their own heavily customized machines.

The combat in Gear Up is fierce, so players need to find out how they can make their personal bots even fiercer than the competition.

Title: 8BitMMO
short_description: A free to play retro­-style 2D MMO and a giant construction sandbox!
Description:
