Listen up all of you 8­bit lovers out there! As the name would suggest, 8BitMMO is a free to play retro­style 2D massively multiplayer game! Basically, it’s a giant sandbox. You can build anything your heart desires; be the king of your own castle, or live simply in a quaint little home; and if you choose to build your own city, 8BitMMO has an impressive array of management tools to help you oversee it all! The best part about this persistent streaming world is that it’s free to play!

You and your friends will love the interactivity of 8BitMMO, as you are able to customize your character to fit your own style. Choose from hats, clothing and accessories ­ and even change the color of your skin! If you’re more into action, 8BitMMO has that too! Do you hate the thought of Lobbyist Slugs, Lawyer Cats and Hipsters? Invite your friends and fight off these nefarious enemies together! If you’re looking for something a little bit different, why not become a zombie? In 8BitMMO even that is possible! Just make sure you have a steady supply of brains (yum!) to keep you well fed (and don’t worry about your victims, they’ll just become zombies too!).

8BitMMO is a world built 100% by the people who play it, and the world is massive so you don’t have to worry about running out of room. The game’s MegaMap is based on the Google Maps API and is a handy way to browse the world and share your creations with your friends. Unlike many other games out there, 8BitMMO is under interactive development, which means development of the game is still ongoing, and you have the opportunity to suggest your ideas or vote on others that you like! What will you build?

Title: Siegelord
short_description: A free to play 2D medieval fantasy browser-based MMORTS.
Description:
Siegelord is a free to play 2D medieval fantasy browser-based MMORTS, players compete with other players by expanding the cities they initially start the game with into vast empires. Published by 37 Games Entertainment, the RTS game is a mix of strategy and civilization building. To generate resources, you must construct certain buildings on the land you currently have available to prepare for real-time battles with other players. The battles are simple and somewhat automated. However, you will need to ensure your settlement is prepared well enough to offer the support you’ll need during combat in the form of resources, equipment and troop-enhancing technologies.

Siegelord is set in a medieval fantasy world where three opposing empires, the Albion, Nords Alliance and the Empire of Gorm, fight for territorial domination. Players must choose a faction to fight for, and recruit and equip generals to offer support to your troops in battle. Generals are unlocked throughout the game and offer skills and equipment. You can play through the single-player campaign, or fight other players for territorial control. While battling other players, you must choose the proper formation for your troops (assault, attack or defense) to seize victory. Stay frosty, as the borders of the land of Theiden shift perpetually as players conquer new territory.

Title: Dungeon Defenders 2
short_description: A free-to-play cooperative 3D tower-defense game by Trendy Entertainment.
Description:
Save the land of Etheria in Dungeon Defenders 2, a free-to-play cooperative 3D tower-defense game by Trendy Entertainment. The armies of the Old Ones are invading and it’s up to you and your allies to defend the realm and drive back the vicious hordes. You can take this daunting challenge on by yourself or invite up to three friends to help you seek victory!

Choose from one of four characters – squire, huntress, apprentice, or monk – each with its own set of unique skills and towers it can lay down to burn, freeze, spindle, and mutilate endless waves of enemies. You can customize your character with skill spheres, which boost your hero’s stats, add to his or her abilities, or, in the case of uber skill spheres, radically change how your skills work. As you adventure, you’ll discover powerful artifacts and other equipment that you can equip or break down into components that you can use to create even more powerful gear. You can also recruit companion pets to fight by your side and make your job easier.

In Dungeon Defenders 2’s campaign mode, you’ll need to defend the Eternia Crystal from five waves of monsters on each level. Difficulty level can be set by a hosting player, with the hardest difficulty preventing respawns when heroes die, and some levels include a super-tough boss monster. If you’re really good, you can compete in ranked play to show who’s the best defender in all the realm!

One interesting part of development is influence points. Players earn a point each day visiting the website or logging into the game. From time to time, Trendy Entertainment will put topics up to vote that players can choose to spend their influence points on. This way, Trendy can get feedback from its most loyal players to help shape further development of the game.
Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support

Title: Blockade 3D
short_description: A free to play FPS in an editable procedural world.
Description:
Blockade 3D is a free to play multiplayer First Person Shooter (FPS) in an editable procedural world similar to Minecraft. In this cubic sandbox you can build and destroy things with 4 teams at the same time and up to 32 players on one map.

In Blockade 3D you can build your own map, be the last-man-standing against zombies, be in a tank battle and more. You can also upgrade your weapon and equipment, there is lots of in-game possibilities.

Title: Eldevin
short_description: A indie story-driven Free to Play MMORPG.
Description:
Eldevin is a indie free to play, browser-based (and client-based) fantasy MMORPG developed by Hunted Cow Studios. The game takes place in the Eldevin Kingdom with the story based on the discovery of Elemental Spheres.

Take on Eldevin’s massive world where any action that you take can affect future quests that you may run into. Speaking of quests never fear of running out of something to do, Eldevin offers hundreds of quests that can change from character to character depending upon how you resolve certain situations.

Instead of choosing a close in Eldevin you will be choosing from 100s of abilities in six different talent trees. This offers a much wider range of customization than a simple class system could ever offer and with the game’s real-time combat system it will be very different from other MMORPG experiences.

After you get done diving into the multiple dungeons and instances that Eldevin has to offer you will have most likely acquired some crafting materials that you can use to craft your own weapons, armor, and items with the 14 different professions that Eldevin offers.

Eldevin is a free to play MMO that has a great story line, tons of quests with a dynamic universe, a class-less real-time combat system, and tons of crafting that you are able to do.
Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
Graphics: Graphics Card Recommended. (OpenGL 3.0 support and above)

Title: Double Action
short_description: A free to play FPS with bullet time and stylish kills!
Description:
Double Action is a free to play multiplayer online FPS that incorporates bullet time (Matrix style!) in free for all matches across tons of different environments. Get higher scores for kills with flair and claim to the top of the scoreboards.

Use the crazy bullet time where you slow down the time for both you and your opponents so that you can decide on your next plan of action. As you are participating in the free for all that is Double Action try to get some stylish kills while diving, rolling and flipping to earn extra points to win the match.

While you don’t choose from different characters to play as you do get to choose what their special ability will be. There is a wide selection of different special abilities that every character can have. Some give you extra grenades while others might give you faster movement speed. You are also able to customize your weapon loadout and change it during the match to counter whatever your opponents are doing and develop the perfect combination of items for yourself.

Double Action is an FPS that incorporates bullet time into the fast paced moments of free for all action. Get stylish kills, customize your special abilities, and choose the perfect combination of items for yourself in Double Action.

Title: Pox Nora
short_description: A multiplayer online game that combines a collectible card game with a turn-based strategy game.
Description:
If you’re looking for a turn-­based strategy game that encompasses the elements of tabletop miniatures, fantasy RPG and collectible card game, look no further than Pox Nora. Developed and published by Desert Owl Games LLC, Pox Nora combines great 2D graphics with endless adventure. Players take their deck of cards, known as Runes, and go on an adventure in countless single player campaigns, and skirmish against the game’s AI; and if you’re looking for a multiplayer experience, Pox Nora has that too, with PvP match ups. Public decks are available to unlock with gold, or by playing the faction walk through campaigns and if you like Pox Nora, you can expand your deck options by purchasing additional rune packs that will give you access to more Champions, Spells, Relics and Equipment. But don’t worry ­ if you’re not looking to spend money, that’s okay. Pox Nora is completely free to play.

Pox Nora allows you to build decks from eight unique factions through full or split faction play and when you build your collection of runes over time you will be able to customize your decks with the Rune Manager. You can even trade in runes with other community members or build them with the Rune Forge. For the more competitive among us, you are able to join in draft tournaments to win prizes, and are able to save up and send virtual gold that you earn by playing the game, to get additional characters and more in the game’s Marketplace.
Graphics: NVIDIA or ATI Video Card with 64MB of VRam, with current video drivers

Title: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio
short_description: What's better than Counter-Strike? Counter-Strike with more modes and Zombies!
Description:
Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio is the free-to-play massively multiplayer online FPS that asks the simple question: What’s better than Counter-Strike? Answer: Counter-Strike with new game modes, map creation and lots of zombies! Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio is Nexon’s free-to-play take on the Counter-Strike franchise, adding zombies to several familiar game modes, and making it possible for players to become infected themselves and to strike back at their former colleagues. Braaaaaaains…

Using the original Counter-Strike Engine from way back when, CSN:Z features over 20 different game modes, spread out across both PvP and PvE. You’ll take on challenging bosses, lead a ragged group of survivors through zombie-infested territory, or defend your home base against wave after wave of the hungry undead. There are even takes on the classic Counter-Strike maps and scenarios, such as Bomb Defusal and Hostage Rescue.

You’ll have at your disposal a vast array of weaponry to deal with the zombies, from 12-gauge shotguns to double-barrel shotguns to combat shotguns to weapons that aren’t shotguns! CSN:Z includes a versatile crafting system with which you can improve your weapons or create entirely new ones – including shotguns! With the Family system, you can share your gear with your friends, especially handy if they’re low on shotguns.

Sometimes, though, the need to feed is too strong, and you’ll be cast in the role of a zombie rather than a human. In these scenarios, you’ll have a number of brain-gnawing skills and attacks at your disposal. Zombies can increase their passive abilities, such as speed or enhanced jumping capabilities, as well as learn special attacks to carve through those squishy humans.

With tons of gameplay modes and over 60 maps to learn and master, Counter-Strike Nexon: Zombies offers fast-paced action with multitudes of strategic options that’s sure to please fans of shooters and survival games alike. Just make sure to bring plenty of shotguns.

Title: Uncharted Waters Online
short_description: A free to play adventure MMORPG set on the high seas!
Description:
Uncharted Waters Online is a 3D trading and exploration MMORPG published by OGPlanet. Adventure through the European Age of Exploration as either a merchant, adventurer, or a soldier. Sail through the seas of various European nations as you fight to conquer their ports and to turn their gold into yours.

Sail across the globe to new ports and conquer them in the name of your chosen nation through either the peaceful means of trade or the aggressive means of combat. Choose to join either England, The Netherlands, France, Spain, Portugal, Venice, or the Ottoman Empire and conquer the world underneath your nations flag.

Choose from three different paths: Adventurer, Merchant, or Soldier. As the Merchant you will be going out and focusing on trade and economy in the world to take over different ports. As the Soldier you will be attempting to take over ports by force. The Adventurer will be traveling the world discovering new things and attempting to take over ports in a mix of combat and trade.

Battle on Land and Sea in Uncharted Waters Online. You can choose to blast your enemies with cannon fire from your ship or dock and pick up a musket and sword to fight them along the coast. The high seas are entirely open PvP zones so you must be careful when adventuring beyond the safe shallow coasts.

Uncharted Waters Online is a 3D trading and exploration MMORPG that focuses on a player driven economy and allows you to take control of new ports for your chosen nation. Adventure out into the open seas and participate in the PvP naval combat or fight along the shores with sword and musket.

Title: ArcheAge
short_description: A free-to-play, hybrid fantasy/sandbox MMORPG brought to you by Trion Worlds.
Description:
ArcheAge is a free-to-play, hybrid fantasy/sandbox MMORPG brought to you by Trion Worlds. Set in the fantasy world of Erenor, players are sent out on a journey of their own choosing. Players start on one of two continents: Nuia, home of the elves or Harihara, home of the Ferres. After that, the choices are up to the player from where to go, to why, and what actions to perform.

ArcheAge offers four unique races which possess their own innate qualities with an additional ten skill trees that create up to one hundred and twenty class options. By choosing three of the ten basic skill types, players are essentially able to create their own class tailored to their own unique style of gameplay.

Pets can be purchased and trained into mounts or as companions on the battlefield. The crafting system features 21 professions whose actions are performed using labor points. Labor points are gained based on time spent in game (unless you are a premium member) and accumulate over time. There are 7 different levels of mastery for each profession and each level grants a crafting benefit of some sort to the player.

ArcheAge features both PvE and PvP options. PvE choices include the typical dungeons and quests, while PvP offers features such as the Justice System, Arenas, Naval Battles and World PvP. Community options go beyond what is typical for an MMORPG, and while guilds are a part of the community, there are also factions and families. Land ownership plays a great deal into the gameplay of ArcheAge with individual players and guilds vying for land any time a new zone is added into the game.

With so many options to choose from, ArcheAge affords players the unique opportunity to become completely immersed in their world.  From character creation, to the economy, to the community, to the sandbox style world; the choices are endless.
Os: Windows XP / Sp3 / Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8000 series 512 MB / Radeon HD 4000 Series or better

Title: Tribal Wars 2
short_description: The sequel to the classic city-building strategy game Tribal Wars!
Description:
Published by InnoGames, Tribal Wars 2 is a browser based strategy MMO game that allows players to rule over a castle in a medieval kingdom plagued by perpetual war. The land is brimming with nights and barbarians in this sequel to the online city-building strategy game Tribal Wars. The goal is to expand your kingdom and defend it from enemy players in this real-time PvP-driven world. Players can progress through the game in various different fashions depending on what units they decide to recruit. To conquer the world, players can exercise diplomacy and forge alliances to defend themselves against opponents, or break alliances and defeat other players in battle.

Your kingdom exists under the constant threat of enemy players that can occur regardless of whether you’re logged in. The MMORTS game allows players to engage in strategic battles, requiring them to choose the proper units for the situation, defend from attacks and launch counter-attacks. You can also recruit spies to analyze your enemy’s defenses. Other players can do the same, however, so be sure to strategically launch countermeasures to ensure you are prepared for anything.

Title: WAKFU
short_description: A 2D tactical turn-based fantasy MMORPG developed by Ankama Games, in conjunction with Square Enix.
Description:
Wakfu is a free to play 2D tactical turn-based fantasy MMORPG developed by Ankama Games, in conjunction with Square Enix. WAKFU features a robust and diverse class system and strategic, turn based gameplay. To end the description there would do the game an injustice though as WAFKU also boasts a more “persistent” type world in that killed enemies or gathered resources might never appear again.

The game’s two dimensional, anime art style has spawned a series of anime shows and comic books. In game, players can take part in crafting, PvP (also turn based), and even mold the world they play in. Farm and replenish the land, or take what you want and leave nothing for others, the choice is yours. WAKFU’s in game systems extend even deeper though as players compete to win over others in a bid to become Governor in player led elections.

Upon creating a character, players are quickly given all of their class’s abilities very early in game and progression is left to the player’s own desires. Skill up certain abilities the way you want to play and at your own pace.

While WAKFU is technically free-to-play, this title certainly benefits from a subscription as much of the game can feel limited if you are not paying the subscription fee. The subscription costs are low when compared to most subscription based MMORPGs, but players will want to check out the free portion of the game a bit before deciding if the game’s unique style and systems are worth your hard earned cash.

Title: Infinity Wars
short_description: A MMO trading card game, Build up your decks and customize them with tons of factional cards!
Description:
Infinity Wars: Animated Trading Card Game is an MMO trading card game published by Lightmare Studios. Build up your decks and customize them with tons of factional cards to forge an empire. Go through the storyline or compete against other players in PvP matches.

Learn everything there is to know about the game’s five factions by completing the very extensive campaign. As you complete the campaign you will earn new cards and decks to use later on. Whichever faction you choose to play as will determine your play style. Some factions focus on attacking other player’s morale while others set up impenetrable defenses.

The matches take place in a simultaneous turn-based system where you have to predict what your opponent will do. You divide the playing field into four zones and each of them require special attention to defeat the other player. Once you have mastered Infinity Wars take your game to the next level and challenge other players in the competitive PvP scene that is available. You can earn rewards and glory by competing in the competitive PvP matches.

Infinity Wars: Animated Trading Card Game is an MMO that focuses on building up a deck of cards and predicting enemy’s movements to defeat them in battles.

Title: Divine Souls
short_description: A action-based MMORPG in a fantasy world with magic and technology.
Description:
Divine Souls is an action-based MMORPG with real-time combat combos developed by GamePrix. You are placed into a fantasy world where advanced technologies and magic coexist. Choose from different classes and battle in PvE and PvP arenas using your technology, or your magic, to conquer all.

When you start the game you are able to choose from four different classes. The Fighter, a melee class that can soak a bit of damage, The Slasher, a melee class that focuses on dishing out the damage, the Mage, a ranged class that will deal tons of damage at a distance, or the Priest, a support class that will make sure everyone stays alive.

Your goal in Divine Souls is to wade through instance after instance clearing areas that are littered with monsters and always have an epic boss battle waiting at the end. Or if PvP is more your speed take to the PvP arenas and show off your player killing skills there, get rewards for the higher you progress in the ranks.
Graphics: GeForce 7 Series or equivalent or later

Title: Cubic Castles
short_description: A free to play 3D Platforming and a open world building game.
Description:
Cubic Castles is a free to play online 3D platforming and a open world voxel building game. In this massively multiplayer persistent world you can build anything you want using cubes and other items!

Explore worlds made by other players or find a plot of land and start creating! Crafting is intuitive, just drag your raw resources and tools into a workbench to see what you can build. Build anything you can dream up and explore with other players or create parkour challenges with crazy obstacles like mechanical spikes, lava, quicksand and more.

In Cubic Castles you can create your own unique look with shirts, hats, glasses and more!
Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher. Athlon 64 or higher

Title: Creativerse
short_description: Playful Corporation enters the sandbox, voxel world with their free-to-play title Creativers.
Description:
Playful Corporation enters the sandbox, voxel world with their free-to-play title Creativerse. Upon first glance it may be easy to dismiss this game as simply another Minecraft clone but players looking for something a bit different will want to give this title a shot.

Yes, You’ll be gathering materials and building things. Yes, you’ll be upgrading your armor. However, with a wide variety of unique systems (such as taming animals and caring for them to earn extra loot or even farming) there’s something a bit different in Creativerse.

The voxel based world is colorful and vibrant and the game’s multiplayer options make it very easy to pair up with some friends on PvE, PvP, or even RP servers. Each world has a wide variety of biomes to explore, ancient technology to find, and recipes to construct so simply getting the best gear is only the beginning of the game.

If you were turned off by the game’s initial stumbles with Early Access and their cash shop, you should know that the cash shop has been converted to a cosmetic only shop and the initial complaints of required purchasing are no longer the case.
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600, 2.4 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 920 Quad-Core 2.8 GHz or better

Title: Royal Quest
short_description: A free to play fantasy MMORPG game with unique PvPvE locations, PvP Arenas, Battlegrounds and Castle Sieges.
Description:
Royal Quest is a free to play fantasy MMORPG game with several unique PvPvE locations, PvP Arenas, Battlegrounds and Castle Sieges. You will get a fresh MMO experience in Royal Quest ­ developed by Katauri and published by 1C Online Games, the creators of Space Rangers and King’s Bounty series.

Royal Quest gives you an innovative elemental battle system which allows players to exploit enemy weaknesses by properly choosing which weapons and skills to use against the target, while using game mechanics that are easy to learn (including an automatic character upgrade system), and offer a deep and challenging experience later in the game.

When you play Royal Quest, you will discover over 100 outdoor locations and multi­floor dungeons while you complete nearly 1000 quests designed for both group and single players. You will be able to fight more than 200 extraordinary monsters, each with its own rare card with special attributes and dive into extensive skills and talents system and combine them in a unique way for each of the 8 classes!

When you get lonely, Royal Quest allows you to summon pets that follow you around and collect loot for you, compete with other players in PvP Arenas, Battlegrounds and Castle Sieges, as well as earn the right to control a Castle and its surrounding areas with your Guild! You will compete in PvP Arenas, Battlegrounds and Castle Sieges and gather powerful Shadow Gear by winning over other players in special PvPvE zones!
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon X2 64 3.0 Ghz

Title: Guns and Robots
short_description: A free to play online third person shooter with massive customization!
Description:
Guns and Robots is a free to play cartoony third person shooter. Do bright 3D graphics and attractive environments catch your attention? Are you a fan of robots? If you’ve answered yes to any of these questions, you should most definitely check out Guns and Robots. This game, developed and published by Masthead Studios Ltd combines them all in an action ­packed easy to master game that provides an entertaining experience and numerous options to construct the perfect robot.

Guns and Robots gives players the ability to make massive customizations by creating robots in one of three module classes based on the player’s’ assembly, and then allow for unlimited customization options thereafter. Players are also able to pinpoint enemies with multiple weapons, all at the same time! A wide variety of potential combinations per weapons allows players to fine tune their weaponry according to their game play preferences. Add in multiple maps to this mixture, and you’ve created a cocktail for adrenaline­pumping gameplay that will thrill you all day long!

In Guns and Robots, players are able to join or create guilds and participate in guild events. Being a part of a guild will even lead to numerous benefits and build features. If you’re more into the solo scene, you can have a dynamic combat experience by choosing to line up for high level real time combat events against other players. Three additional game modes make Guns and Robots even more exciting ­ Capture the Batteries ­ a Capture the Flag­ like mode, Team Deathmatch and Bomb Squad ­ where your goal is to destroy the Enemy’s base. No matter what you’ve chosen, Guns and Robots offers a variety of achievements for those players who have demonstrated exceptional performance.

For those hardcore Guns and Robots players, Masthead Studios Ltd has released multiple Downloadable Content packages including a Starter Pack that includes 1000 Sparks and 150 Upgrade Components to help you blast your way through your enemies!.
Publisher: Masthead Studios Ltd, Thegamewallstudios, Gamigo AG
Graphics: GeForce 6800 / ATI X1800 with 256 MB RAM & compatible with DirectX9.0c

Title: Bleach Online
short_description: A free to play 2D browser based MMORPG based on Bleach, the popular manga and anime series.
Description:
Based on the popular Japanese manga and anime series, Bleach Online is a free-to-play 2D browser-based MMORPG that immerses you in the world of Ichigo Kurosaki and all of the Soul Reapers.

Coming from GoGames, Bleach Online offers a storyline based on what fans of the series know from the manga and anime. They’ll be able to pick from three unique classes that all offer their own advantages and abilities.

For players who like to stay busy while playing their MMORPGs, Bleach Online can be played in AFK Mode so that their characters can level up even when they’re not actively playing thanks to the automated combat system.

But don’t feel like you’re going to have to go it alone. Bleach Online players can recruit iconic characters from the manga and anime series to join their party out in the field to really take the fight to the Hollows with up five partners.

And for an extra fun addition, Bleach Online allows players to put some of the more notable characters in bikinis in the self-styled Bikini Game.

If you love Bleach then Bleach Online is definitely worth a look.

Title: Robocraft
short_description: A free-to-play MMO sandbox building game!
Description:
Your imagination is the limit in Robocraft, a free-to-play massively multiplayer online sandbox building game from Freejam. Use hundreds of parts to create your unique robot and then take it into battle against other players in a “robo-MOBA,” where the action is fierce and the parts will be flying like popcorn!

Robots in Robocraft are made of cubes, which you gain access to by leveling up your robot. The more cubes your robot has, the higher its robot ranking, and the higher its robot ranking, the more rewards you get in battle that you can use to buy even more cubes. There are over 200 cubes and other components you can acquire to beef up your robot, and the options for building them are nearly limitless. Your robots can drive, walk, or fly, and bristle with weapons, from SMGs to railguns to plasma launchers.

Once your robot is kitted out and ready for a fight, take it into one of Robocraft’s multiplayer modes, such as the battle arena, where each team is tasked with taking out its opponent’s protonium reactor while protecting their own. Towers on the map can be captured and used to strike at your opponents, giving this game mode a very MOBA-like feel. For something a little simpler, try your basic team deathmatch, where the object is to wipe out all of your opponents or capture their base, or the Pit, a free-for-all battle with respawns, where the object is to reach a set number of kills. You can also practice your skills against a test robot or in single-player mode.

More cubes, weapons, and game modes are always in development, and its flexible building system means there’s virtually no limit as to what you can do in Robocraft. Take your robot-building skills to the limit and see how long you can survive!
Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivilent AMD family

Title: Unturned
short_description:
A independently developed free-to-play MMO survival 
game!
Description:
Unturned is an independently developed free-to-play massively multiplayer survival game that borrows inspiration from similar, bigger-budget, titles but has its own unique charm and is one of the best gaming values to be found anywhere on the Internet. You’ll fight for your life against zombies and other players, trying to survive against impossible odds in a post-apocalyptic landscape.

When you start a new character in Unturned, you’ll be dropped off in a random location on the map, with little in the way of supplies to keep you alive. You’ll have to hunt and scavenge for clothes, weapons, food, and drink. Supplies can be further refined into new materials using the game’s extensive crafting system and can even build permanent bases to fortify themselves against both zombie and human enemies. There are also vehicles to be found, which can be used to get around or to act as an additional weapon to flatten your foes. As they harvest items and kill NPCs, characters gain skill points they can use to increase their offensive, defensive, and miscellaneous/support capabilities.

Unturned has four difficulty levels, set by the server owner. Easy mode is for players new to survival games and has greater loot drops. Normal mode is the standard. Hardcore mode makes several game elements more difficult and removes most UI elements for a more “natural” experience. Finally, there’s Gold mode, available only to Gold subscribers, with vastly increased loot spawns and XP gains. Also If you’re after a battle royale game then seek out Unturned: Arena Mode

Unturned was developed by 16-year-old Nelson Sexton, who cut his designing teeth by creating popular levels for Roblox. Despite its humble origins and simple artistic design, Unturned has been downloaded on Steam by nearly 20 million players as of the start of 2016 and Sexton continues to update the game on a regular basis, with his only compensation being inexpensive Gold packs that allow for premium servers and greater character customization.

Title: Warface
short_description: A free-to-play multiplayer online FPS from Crytek, makers of the Far Cry and Crysis series of games.
Description:
Warface is a free-to-play online FPS from Crytek, makers of the Far Cry and Crysis series of games, that utilizes the company’s proprietary CryEngine to provide first-rate graphics and a hard-hitting, fast-paced shooter experience. In the near future, a long-running global recession has brought about countless wars, and it’s up to the players to choose a side and fight for justice or for their own personal enrichment. Choose your class, choose your battleground, and prepare to engage in intense firefights that place as much value on teamwork as on individual skill with your weapon.

There are four classes in Warface – rifleman, sniper, medic, and engineer – and all have to work together to complete the objective at hand. There are loads of options for modifying your chosen class’s primary and secondary weapons, so no two characters ever play quite the same. In combat, you’ll utilize several traditional and high-intensity moves, such as vaulting over obstacles or sliding to take out the bad guys, and any class might be called upon to help out an ally in need.

Battles in Warface take place all over the world, from the Balkans of Eastern Europe to the crowded city streets of Asia to the oil fields of the Middle East. There is a wide variety of mission types available, in both PvP and co-operative PvE. In PvP missions, players choose one of the two sides in the global war: the U.S. military splinter group Warface or the opportunistic mercenaries of Blackwood. Warface also recently introduced a new Battle Royale mode with a brand new PvP map created especially for the Battle Royale mode.

The PvE mission types run the gamut of gameplay. One type of mission, Cyber Horde, was added during Halloween 2013 and tasks players with escorting a truck through territory that’s infested with cyborg zombies. Other PvE mission types see players searching for a mech in a hostile village or playing through a series of three missions.
Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2 GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2 GHz
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or AMD ATI Radeon 3650

Title: Freestyle2: Street Basketball
short_description: A free to play MMO street basketball game. Team up with the best street ballers!
Description:
Freestyle2: Street Basketball is a free to play MMO street basketball game. Take to the streets for some 3v3 basketball in Joycity’s Freestyle2: Street Basketball. Improving on the original in almost every way, Freestyle2 sports a unique art style, clever music integration of a unique Hip Hop soundtrack, and the bragging rights of being the top basketball MMO on the market…because there’s just so many of them.

Choose from 1 of 5 positions (Center, Power Forward, Small Forward, Shooting Guard, and Point Guard) and quest your way through the streets using your jump shot, fly set up, dunk, or absurd arcade shot to gain experience and develop your character through choosing from over 30 different skills to impact your gameplay. Your character has a myriad of options available to customize their look using outfits, hairstyles, shoes, and more.

While the game itself may sound simple, (the tutorial will take you through just about every skill in the game) the gameplay becomes addictive when you team up with other players, play in tournaments, and discover just how much teamwork will be needed to topple the best teams on the street.

Title: Fistful of Frags
short_description: A first person shooter game set in the Wild West!
Description:
Fistful of Frags is a multiplayer first person skill demanding shooter game developed and published by an in­house team. You’ll experience nonstop action­-packed scenes set in the Wild West, with classic death match style gameplay up to four teams. It’s FPS nonstop action, all the way around.

Fistful of Frags features a detailed dual wielding systems complete with double dynamic cross hairs, the option to weapon flip for extra accuracy, and the ability to drop or throw your handguns as projectiles. The game also features advanced multiplayer bots that allow for offline practice.

Fistful of Frags stays authentic to it’s Wild West roots, by using historically accurate black gunpowder based weapons such as the Colt Peacemaker/Navy/Walker, Volcanic pistol, Derringer, Smith Carbine, Sharps Rifle or the Henry Rifle. You’ll feel like throwing on your best cowboy boots and chewing wheat stalks when you see it!

Aside from extreme historical accuracy, Fistful of Frags also features many customization options including the ability to choose a primary and secondary weapon with special parks, and access to a skills based scoring system where the score is based on how many skills are required to accomplish an attack (the more skill required, the higher the score is).

The best part of Fistful of Frags is the Source Engine 2013, with allows for community managed dedicated servers, LAN support, 3rd party level design and user customization. So what do you say, cowboy? Are you ready to take on the Wild West?

Title: GunZ 2: The Second Duel
short_description: A free-to-play multiplayer Third Person Shooter and follow up to the successful GunZ: The Duel.
Description:
GunZ 2: The Second Duel is the free-to-play fast-paced Third Person Shooter (TPS) follow up to the successful GunZ: The Duel. Released in 2013/2014 by MAIET Entertainment, the property is now owned by MattietSoft and is run mostly through player hosted servers.

GunZ 2 features 6 classes for players to choose from. Each class offers its own unique skills and abilities so players are free to take on the role of more defense based characters or run and gun type heroes based on personal preference.

Movement in game is augmented through the addition of dashing, wall running, and various gymnastic tumbling moves. These moves add a layer of mobility not found in most other third person shooters and allows melee combat to play a larger role in the game.

There are currently 5 game modes available and 6 maps available for play. Modes range from typical death matches to objective based gameplay. GunZ 2 also offers a PvE mode where players can band together in small groups and play through story missions in an attempt to take down the Adam Corporation.
Processor: Intel Dual Core or 2.4 GHz AMD CPU

Title: Archeblade
short_description: A free-to-play PvP-based multiplayer action game based on a Korean Fantasy Novel.
Description:
ArcheBlade is a team-based fighting game powered by Unreal 3 and developd by CodeBrush Games. Choose from a large selection of characters and take control of a great combination fighting system to come out on top in ArcheBlade.

Choose from a ton of unique and exciting characters to fight with in ArcheBlade, each of these characters have their own unique fighting styles with combo attacks that can be utilized by pressing the left and right mouse buttons to string together flurries of attacks. You can also execute moves by jumping and dashing.

While you are fighting your character will have a rage meter that is slowing filling up when you receive and deliver damage. Once that rage meter fills up your character is able to unleash its special ability that can range from heals to powerful area of effect attacks that deal massive amounts of damage. Choose different gameplay styles, like forward bruiser or ranged assassin, to deal with all sorts of situations.

ArcheBlade is a team-based fighting game that is powered by Unreal 3 and offers a ton of unique characters to fight with. Execute amazing combos by executing button combinations similar to those from classic fighting games like Street Fighter.
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.86 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHz

Title: Villagers and Heroes
short_description: A free-to-play fantasy sandbox 3D MMORPG that has plenty to offer gamers.
Description:
Villagers and Heroes (previously known as A Mystical Land) is a free-to-play fantasy sandbox 3D MMORPG that has plenty to offer gamers. Based more on crafting than combat, Villagers and Heroes gives players who are looking to build their own worlds without the threat of combat create to their heart’s content.

The focus of Villagers and Heroes is player built communities, where players can build a village that matches their wants and desires. Players can customize their characters to an in-depth degree that other MMORPGs lack (such as backstory).

Crafting is essential in Villagers and Heroes, and players can focus their talents on one area of skill or even master them all. And if players want to challenge themselves again after having built world they’re proud of, they can reset their character back to Level 1 and begin fresh.

Though lighthearted in tone and atmosphere, players who want to build their world in a relaxing and supportive environment will find much to love about Villagers and Heroes.

Title: Hex
short_description: HEX combines roleplaying aspects of a MMO with the collectible and strategic gameplay of a Trading Card Game.
Description:
Hex: Shards of Fate is a free to play MMO trading card game (TCG) that allows customization and skill to determine the victor. Players can build and upgrade their decks and battle one another! Hex offers an engaging online card battling game that many players will swiftly become engrossed in.

Hex starts off with an intuitive tutorial that helps new players get accustomed to the game. Players will learn basic rules and strategies as well as what rewards they can expect from winning.

Once the tutorial is out of the way, Hex players can engage in card battle with NPCs and other players, strengthening their card deck with each victory. Every player is a champion hero who has access to a special talent that can be called upon in the heat of pitched card battles.

Players can also compete in special PvE tournaments in the Frost Ring Arena of Hex. Rewards vary between stronger and rare cards to in-game gold that players can spend at the shop.
Processor: Pentium D 805 2.67GHz or Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+
Graphics: GeForce 6800 GT or Radeon X1600 Pro 512MB

Title: Pocket Starships
short_description: A free-to-play cross-platform space combat MMO from SPYR games.
Description:
Pocket Starships is a free-to-play cross-platform space combat MMO from SPYR games. The game is playable on a variety of mobile devices as well as on PC via browsers, allowing it to be played anywhere using true cross-platform play.

It features PvP as well as co-op and a robust quest system that allows players to advance their rank. The PvP offers players a league system with 1v1, 3v3, and 5v5 matches.

In addition, there is a full crafting system that allows players to build and upgrade most items in the game. This includes ships, weapons, and more.

Title: Sparta: War of Empires
short_description: A 2D browser-based MMORTS in which players must exercise their city-management skills to construct and upgrade different structures and troops.
Description:
Sparta: War of Empires is a free to play 2D browser-based MMORTS in which players must exercise their city-management skills to construct and upgrade different structures and troops to conquer new territory in fifth century Greece. Recruit various different upgradeable military units to incorporate into your soon-to-be vast army to defend your city-state and conquer Xerxes’ forces.

In this real-time strategy game, voice-acted King Leonidas serves as your guide to Ancient Greece. The game boasts great quality graphics, a medium player base and voiced tutorials. Players can form allegiances with their friends to vanquish rival groups. Sparta: War of Empires offers diplomatic elements that players can utilize to obtain resources, which you will require to further expand your Spartan city-state. These diplomatic endeavors include trading and borrowing war materials from your allies, or stealing them from your enemies.

Title: Smite
short_description: A popular free-to-play 3D MOBA where you take on the role of an ancient god.
Description:
SMITE is Hi-Rez Studio’s free-to-play MOBA title where you take on the role of an ancient god in a duel for ultimate dominance over god and man alike. With a thriving competitive scene and active support from its developer, SMITE has carved out an impressive niche in the crowded MOBA market.

Players take on the roles of mythological gods and other legendary cultural icons, such as Zeus, Isis, Kali, or Sun Wukong, the Monkey King. Gods fill the typical roles of mage, warrior, hunter, guardian, or assassin, and they can augment their abilities with items purchased during matches. Each god has a basic attack and four unique abilities, in line with their traditional powers, such as Zeus’ mastery of lightning or Sun Wukong’s transformations.

Unlike other MOBAs and their overhead view, SMITE has an over-the-shoulder, third-person look, which sets it apart visually and offers more strategic options for long-range targeting. There are multiple game modes to SMITE, but the most popular is the traditional MOBA-style five-on-five Conquest mode. In this mode, there are three lanes, protected by towers and phoenixes, with the ultimate goal of taking down the opposing team’s titan in their home base. The other areas of the map contain camps of enemies that players can defeat to earn experience and gold to level up their gods and to buy more and better items. And, of course, killing your opponents doesn’t hurt, either.

Other game modes in SMITE include Arena, a kind of team deathmatch; Joust, a limited form of Conquest with just one lane; Assault, similar to ARAM modes in other MOBAs; and Siege, a game mode with a special juggernaut that powers through enemy defenses. Finally, SMITE is a major player in the e-sports scene, with its 2016 World Championships drawing millions of viewers and $1 million in prizes.
Os: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista or Windows 7
Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 512MB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support.

Title: Dogs of War Online
short_description: Based on the famous miniature board game Confrontation!
Description:
Based on the famous miniature board game Confrontation, Dogs of War Online is a unique free-to-play, turn-based tactical game that sets players in a three way conflict between the forces of Light, Dark, and Destiny. Players will have to build their troops and engage in fierce battles on behalf of their employers, whoever they may be.

Each faction has its own different style of play, but players will also have access to nine different champions to lead their companies with in Dogs of War Online. Along with 54 unique units to unlock, players will find that the number of troop combinations are near infinite.

Combat in Dogs of War Online is made up of multiple objectives. It’s not enough to simply defeat the enemy with pure combat strength and numbers. Assassinate them, defend the champion, or destroying all of the enemy units works too.

Dogs of War Online also has a player interface system that will allow players to interact with one another. This comes in use during the various tournaments that give players the opportunity to win rare prizes.

Fans of tabletop gaming will find a lot to love about Dogs of War Online.
Os: Windows XP/Vista/Win7/Win8 x86 or x64 bit
Processor: AMD/Intel dual-core 1.8 GHz. AMD Athlon II and Intel Core2Duo at least
Memory: 1.5GB for MS Windows XP, 2GB MS Windows Vista, 7 and 8 GB RAM
Graphics: ATI/nVidia 256MB VRAM, DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 4.0 support. ATI/AMD Radeon 3800 series and above and NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series at least.

Title: Hearthstone: Heroes of Warcraft
short_description:
Blizzard's free-to-play collectible card game that 
draws its inspiration from World of Warcraft.
Description:
Hearthstone is Blizzard’s free-to-play collectible card game that draws its inspiration from the rich history and lore of World of Warcraft. Specifically optimized for online play, with lots of special effects and random elements, Hearthstone is a game you can play for 10 minutes or three hours. There are an infinite number of ways to build your deck and games require strategic thinking and the ability to adapt rapidly to an ever-changing field of play.

You’ll start by creating a deck based around a hero who represents one of the classes of World of Warcraft, such as hunter, mage, warlock, or druid. Decks contain 30 cards, with no more than two of any individual cards or one legendary card. Legendaries represent some of the most powerful and notable characters in the World of Warcraft universe, such as Ragnaros or Deathwing, and can swing the balance of a game the instant they hit the board.

Games are turn-based. On your turn, you play minions and cast spells, and then use your minions to attack your opponent’s minions or his hero directly. Each player starts with 30 health, and the object is to reduce your opponent’s health to zero before he can do the same to you.

There are several game modes in Hearthstone. You can play casual games or compete in ranked play to work your way up the ranking ladder and achieve the Legend status. There’s also the Arena, where players pay a fee to enter and build their decks from a random assortment of cards. They are then matched up against other Arena players until they take three losses or win 12 games. The farther a player progresses in the Arena, the greater his rewards. There are also Tavern Brawls, which features specialized rules or random decks, which rotate out on a weekly basis. Blizzard adds new card sets and solo adventures on a regular basis, so there are always new cards to collect and strategies to explore.
Processor: Intel Pentium D / AMD Athlon 64 X2
Graphics: GeForce 6800 (256 MB Video Ram) or ATI Radeon X1600 Pro

Title: Lucent Heart
short_description: A free to play MMORPG with a match making system that helps players find their soulmates.
Description:
Lucent Heart is a 3D fantasy MMORPG with a unique Zodiac system that plays an important role in your character are you progress through the game. It features cute anime style graphics and the game encourages social interaction between other players and relationship building through its soulmate system.

There is a built in match making system in Lucent Heart that helps players find their soulmates somewhere in the game. Let Cupid find love for you as you are allowed to have three different soul mates in game, but only one of them you can marry. Soulmates will earn shared experience, special emotes, and a few more things to make their experience better than those without Soulmates.

Choose to either be a Mage or a Fighter that can advance at level 10 to another class and then can advance two more times at level 36. With that being a total of eight different classes to choose from Lucent Heart has a great class selection with a good amount of customization.

Lucent Heart has a strong focus on the social interactive side of gaming. Fall in love in Lucent Heart by finding your Soulmate and then getting married for special treatment within the game.

Title: League of Angels
short_description: A free to play 2D browser-based fantasy MMORPG with turn-based combat.
Description:
Fight to save the world from eternal darkness in League of Angels (LOA), a 2D browser-based fantasy MMORPG with strategy elements and familiar gameplay mechanics.

League of Angels features turn-based combat, lots of content and mini-games built around the game’s theme. Players can choose between three classes as well as which gender they want their character to be.

Your mount is one of your best ways to achieve a stat boost in League of Angels, but remember that a lot of the content within this game is pay-to-win.

Players can also make use of the AFK system in League of Angels while multitasking, making character grinding easy and perfectly contained in the background.

For players looking for an interesting take on angelic myth, League of Angels is an interesting pick to give consideration to. Join other players in an effort to rescue the Angels that have been imprisoned by the evil Suurde!

Title: Aura Kingdom
short_description: Aura Kingdom is a 3D free-to-play Anime MMORPG from the same great studio that brought us Eden Eterna.
Description:
Aura Kingdom ­ from the same great studio that brought us Eden Eternal and Grand Fantasia ­ is a free­to­play Anime MMORPG. The game offers stunning graphics and the ability to create a character that is one of a kind. You can choose from one of eleven different classes (with subclasses becoming available at level 40) and then add skills to make your character unique to your game­playing style. It’s easy to see why people are in love with the world of Azuria! On your adventure, you’ll walk alongside your Eidolon ­ a loyal interactive companion who can grant you strength in battle and unleash some pretty massive combos! In addition to being a great advantage in battle, your Eidolon can also remember your actions, and tell you what’s on their mind.

Action in the world of Aura Kingdom is fast­paced and dynamic. You have to make sure you’re on top of your game, as thinking and acting fast are key to a successful outcome in battles. Don’t fret though, your character is fully customizable, so you can overcome every challenge you face. Simply improve the skills that fit your style of gameplay and then quickly change your skills during battle, so you’ll be ready no matter what your opponent is throwing your way.

If you like some good scenery with all of that action, Aura Kingdom has you covered on that front, as well. Featuring six great environments, all beautifully designed, you’ll travel the vast land that is Azuria and visit the grand city of Navea, a sacred refuge and beacon of hope for all, and the Helonia Coast, known for being the heart of Terra’s black market ­ if you ever need anything, you can find it here! You’ll also visit Candeo Marsh and Oblitus Wood, among other places, and explore mysterious and hidden dungeons to stop the evil that lurks in the dark. You can become a hero, known throughout the land! What are you waiting for?
Os: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 (32bit/64bit), Windows 8
Processor: Intel Pentium4 2.8 GHz or better; AMD K8 2600 or better
Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6600 or better; ATI Redeon X1600 or better

Title: Crystal Saga
short_description: A free to play 2D browser-based MMORPG that allows players to explore the land of Vidalia.
Description:
Crystal Saga is a free to play 2.5D browser-based MMORPG that allows players to explore the land of Vidalia and defeat enemies like dangerous beasts and barbarians using five distinct classes: knight, mage, rogue, priest and ranger. In traditional MMORPG-style, the game requires a strategic combination of tank, healer and DPS to defeat enemies. The game offers standard fetch, gather and kill quests for players to complete to earn new items, weapons and mounts.

As you through the persistent game, you will earn souls that can be utilized to customize your character’s skills. Players can also earn mounts and fly around Starglade atop a dragon or a phoenix, and train monsters to become dangerous battle partners. Each class in this browser MMO can equip a pair of “battle wings” that, with each additional level, take on a new look and upgrade the player’s stats.

The vast world of Vidalia includes dozens of PvP and PvE zones, more than 50 outdoor maps and several dungeons and battlegrounds. Players can also battle against each other in five different PvP modes, earning new legendary items as their reward. The game is visually appealing, and the saturated colors help make Vidalia an immersive fantasy world with a large player base.

Title: World of Warplanes
short_description: A free-to-play flight combat MMO brought to you by Wargaming.
Description:
World of Warplanes is a free-to-play flight combat MMO brought to you by Wargaming, the developer responsible for titles such as World of Tanks and World of Warships. World of Warplanes features over 100 vehicles from four warplane classes common to various areas of the globe including Germany, the Unites States of America, Japan, and Great Britain. Squadrons of planes become available through game progression and range from entry-level Tier-I planes all the way to Tier X jet powered aircraft. Each plane within the same tier has varying stats for maneuverability and firepower based on the nation to which the plane belongs.

The game features two different modes of PvP. In Training Mode, the focus is on learning the basics of aircraft maneuverability and firing weapons at an assortment of static and moving targets. This is accomplished through a series of lessons. In Standard Battles players can advance by destroying all of the enemies’ aircraft or by gaining more supremacy points than the opponent. Supremacy points are gained by destroying ground objects and aircraft.

World of Warplanes features three types of in-game currency: credits, experience, and gold. Wargaming.net features a “Unified Account System” allowing players to share certain in game currencies between their World of Tanks, World of Warplanes, and World of Warships accounts including Premium Time, Free Experience, and Gold. World of Warplanes offers a premium account as well with bonuses for the player such as 50% extra experience and credits for each battle which allows for faster advancement for the player.
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6800 Series 128MB or AMD Radeon HD 4550

Title: RIFT
short_description: Trion Worlds’ flagship fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game.
Description:
Rift is a solid 3D fantasy free-to-play massively multiplayer online role-playing game. Trion Worlds’ flagship MMORPG, Rift, started as a subscription based MMORPG and later made a free-to-play conversion in June of 2013. MMORPG players probably remember Rift’s aggressive advertising campaign leading up to its 2011 release. This campaign specifically touted Telara, the game’s world, as the new place for players to be and poked fun at chief rival World of Warcraft with slogans like “You’re not in Azeroth anymore” in most print and media advertisements.

Character creation in Rift allows players to choose their race (limited by faction) and a starting archetype (calling) for your playstyle. The five callings currently available are Primalist, Warrior, Mage, Cleric, and Rogue. Players have ample room for customizations inside these callings though as each calling has a multitude of “souls” (what would be more traditionally referred to as “classes”) that allow players to mix and match abilities within each calling to customize their character’s abilities. This mixing and matching of multiple souls allows hundreds of playstyle combinations, some more viable than others. Some souls are only available through purchases of cash shop packages.

Rift features two faction gameplay between The Defiant and The Guardians, although updates since launch have blurred the lines between factions by allowing factions to group together, chat, and even guild together. Factions still play a role in Rift’s PvP Warfronts. This PvP content features multiple maps and gameplay types that focus on point accumulation or point capturing. Open world PvP is also supported provided you are playing on a PvP server.

Players looking for PvE content will find that Rift offers a vast world to explore, dungeons (solo, duo and party varieties), raids, in world events such as the “Rifts” for which the game is named, and an extensive storyline detailing the elemental planes and how they interconnect and impact the world of Telara. “Instant Adventures” allow players to group quickly, and level rather quickly, through quick bursts of open world content. Traditional questing is also a leveling option.

Numerous subsystems provide Rift players with ample activities in which to partake. Player housing is accomplished through a “Dimensions” system that allows players to unlock multiple area types and decorate them as they see fit. This system has been expanded to also allow players to create their own PvP Dimensions and bring their own PvP maps to life. The Minion mini-game, crafting, collectibles, and achievement hunting are big parts of the Rift community and numerous sites cater to each of these items alone.

While equipment is available in Rift’s cash shop, this equipment is “one off or worse” than the current best equipment available in the game. To achieve the best gear, players will have to play the game and cannot buy their way to max power. Most of this gear is also available through in game currency gathering as well. The cash shop is designed in a “time versus money” approach with players being able to spend either the in game time or the cash to advance quickly, but either method ends with players having to play to achieve the best in slot items. Patron (subscription) status is available for those that want to earn Loyalty points (a cash shop “rewards” program) and receive monthly perks allowing for more rapid character advancement. Players wishing to buy cash shop items without spending real world money have the option of purchasing “REX” in game from other players. REX can be used to obtain credits that can be spent in the cash shop.

Rift is available directly from the Trion Worlds site or through Steam.
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5900, ATI/AMD Radeon X300, Intel GMA X4500 or better.

Title: Path of Exile
short_description: A free-to-play massively multiplayer online ARPG in the style of Diablo.
Description:
Path of Exile is a free-to-play massively multiplayer online ARPG in the style of Diablo that offers amazing flexibility, both in character progression and game modes. The action is brutal and bloody, and the harsh world of Wraeclast takes no prisoners. Fortunately, exiles are hardy sorts, with a number of equally brutal abilities at their disposal to help them survive and thrive in the wild.

There are several character classes in Path of Exile, revolving around three primary attributes – strength, dexterity, and intelligence – or using a mix of two or all three, such as the duelist, a melee class that relies on strength and dexterity. Characters advance through Path of Exiles enormous skill tree, which allows players to select new passive and active abilities as they level up. Gear is similarly flexible, with high-end equipment having slots that can equip gems that provide various bonus effects. In total, there are countless ways to build and equip characters, so that no two will ever be the same.

Path of Exile has a traditional MMO experience, where players can progress through various zones, level up, and gain gear, but there are several other ways to play as well. The most popular is races, where players start with brand new characters and compete to acquire the most experience or achieve other goals over a set period of time, which can range anywhere from a few minutes to a month. Each race season features a number of events, usually numbering over a hundred, and sometimes include race modifiers to make things more challenging.

Finally, Path of Exile has a true commitment to free-to-play, with a relatively small cash shop and no items that grant advantage. It’s become a favorite of many hardcore gamers for its diverse option and challenging content, but it can be enjoyed by a wide range of players of all skill levels.
Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7800 GT or ATI Radeon™ X1950 Pro or better

Title: Soldiers Inc.
short_description: A free to play 2D top-down browser based MMORTS game.
Description:
Soldiers Inc. is a free to play 2D top-down browser based MMORTS game set in an apocalyptic scenario. Players must complete various objectives in order to expand their meager bases into sprawling, formidable forces.

Boasting retro graphics, Soldier’s Inc. allows you to expand your borders and improve your forces with various upgradeable units boasting skill trees. The strategy game offers three distinct types of units: defensive, offensive and recon. Send in your recon troops to analyze your foes before engaging them in battle. Additionally players are also encouraged to PvP against their neighbors, players can form alliances with other player to obliterate your opponents and raid them for their resources.

Zandia is a war-torn world in which players become Commander and take instructions from a mysterious character codenamed Mr. Black. Hired by a black ops organization known as the Syndicate, you must fight other players for territorial control in order to secure resources. Build your army, construct a base, upgrade your units and prepare to do battle.

Title: Nords: Heroes of the North
short_description: A free to play browser-based 2D strategy MMO game with Elves, Orcs, Dragons and more.
Description:
Nords: Heroes of the North is a free to play browser-based 2D fantasy strategy MMO game with appealing cartoony graphics, RPG elements and familiar gameplay. Nords: Heroes of the North is developed and published by Plarium, the same company behind other strategy games such as Soldiers Inc, Stormfall: Age of War and Pirates: Tides of Fortune.

The Ice Queen has returned, and the various races populating the land of Shingard have banded together and elected a leader, King Bjorn. You must take on the role of one of Bjorn’s Lord Marshals. As a Lord Marshal, you are responsible for building and governing Nordic Strongholds populated by various units including dragons, elves, orcs and norsemen. To survive the eternal winter, you must construct buildings and fortifications, produce resources and train your stronghold’s army. Neighboring strongholds will be endeavoring to do the same, and may successfully raid your stronghold if you are not adequately prepared.

Choose to side with certain clans and sign blood packs with various tribes of orcs, elves, norsemen and dragons to gain their wisdom and skills. Players can also use a combination of various units to fight enemies. The game’s primary resources are fish, mushrooms and fire ale. These resources can be found within player stronghold and must be cultivated by constructing fisherman’s huts, mushroom patches and breweries and kept in storehouses and alehouses. Players who find they need additional resources can build special structures to boost production, or attempt to raid neighboring strongholds for their resources.

Title: Dota 2
short_description: Valve's premiere competitive free to play MOBA.
Description:
Dota 2 is Valve’s premiere competitive free-to-play MOBA, the follow-up to the game that started the MOBA genre, Defense of the Ancients. Launched in 2013 to provide an alternative to Riot Games’ League of Legends, Dota 2 cranks up the strategy dial, requiring mastery of one’s hero and exemplary communication between all team members in a game that consistently ranks as one of the best MOBAs in the world.

Two opposing teams of five players select from over a hundred heroes, each with their own unique abilities, to fill out their teams. They travel down three lanes, each guarded by a series of defensive towers and patrolled by AI enemies that are friendly to one of the teams and spawn continuously. The space between lanes, the “jungle,” is occupied by neutral enemies that either team can kill to obtain bonuses. The object of the game is to push through the opponents’ defenses all the way to their base, where their Ancient resides, and destroy it.

Heroes come in a wide variety of flavors, with many different talents and roles. They increase in power as their team kills AI enemies and other players, accumulating XP to level up and gold that can be used to purchase items at their base. Making the proper purchases for your role is an essential piece of strategy, to the point that having the correct “build” is a major part of your strategy.

Thanks in part to its visibility on Valve’s Steam platform, Dota 2 also has a very active professional competitive e-sports scene, with local, regional, national, and worldwide tournaments that offer millions of dollars in prizes. A documentary, titled Free to Play, was released in 2014, and it’s an example of how serious Valve is about bringing e-sports into the mainstream, using its games to tell a story and presenting them as a viable viewing option on par with major professional sports.
Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz

Title: Ragnarok Online 2
short_description: A 3D fantasy MMORPG, and sequel to the popular Ragnarok Online.
Description:
Ragnarok Online 2, otherwise known as Ragnarok Online 2: Legend of the Second is a free to play fantasy MMORPG and is the sequel to the classic Ragnarok Online. This Free to play title takes you back to Midgard, which if you couldn’t guess is greatly inspired by Norse Mythology. With Ragnarok Online 2 being based in the same world as the original, long time players will find a lot of nostalgic value to the setting. There are plenty of gameplay styles at your disposal, allowing you to explore countless areas, visit large cities and even progressing through jobs as a Blacksmith, chef and others.

Along with areas from the first game like Prontera, Ragnarok Online 2 has plenty of new dungeons and areas to sink your teeth into. Having some familiar settings allows old players to see the massive improvements from the first game. Starting with 5 base classes to choose from, you can also choose a specialization. From there, you can choose various different weapon and armor combinations in order to forge the exact character that you wish to play with.

By choosing a job, also known as a specialization, you can craft your own items, so the job you choose to level into will become an important part of your gaming experience within Ragnarok Online 2. You can also open your own store to sell the items you created. Another feature in Ragnarok Online 2 is the card system. There are hundreds of unique cards for you to collect that are equip-able, which are used to increase your stats. These cards are gathered by defeating various enemies. Download Ragnarok Online 2 today and experience Midgard for yourself!
Graphics: VGA GeForce 8600 or later 256 MB of VRAM

Title: Panzar
short_description:
A free-to-play multiplayer third-person shooter with 
rpg elements and CryEngine 3 powered 
graphics.
Description:
Panzar is a free-to-play, team-based, fantasy multiplayer third-person shooter with rpg elements, non-target combat and CryEngine 3 powered graphics. Players choose from different 8 classes, these being Tank, Inquisitor, Paladin, Berserker, Sorceress, Witch, Gunner, and Sapper. The classes are best suited to different styles of gameplay, for example the Paladin performs best as a support, where as the Berserker is ideal for full on melee combat.

The game includes a total of 4 very different game types with dynamic Team-Based PvP and PvE, including maps for each game type. Game types include Domination, King of the Hill, Siege, and Meteor. In a game of Domination players must attack opposing forces for a point of interest, in King of the Hill, players must hold a landmark, and defend making sure that the enemy does not gain control, Siege, is where players need to attack multiple objectives, and the enemy team needs to defend, and lastly the Meteor game type, where the player needs to look for an objective element, and return it to the players base.

Unlike games such as League of Legends which uses an isometric perspective, the player is controlled using a third person view. The landscape is remarkable incredible from snowy and cold environments, to volcanoes. Which are all rendered with the lovely CryEngine 3 game engine. The maps are handled nicely since when you start a new game the map will be chosen randomly.  A unique aspect for each map are the secrets in the map which a player can use to change the map for the players advantage.

Attacking enemy players in Panzar is based on a free-targeting type of game. Damaging enemy players is entirely based on the angle of attack. The controls for the game use the mouse in order to strike attacks. The left mouse button is used for auto-attacks, and the right mouse button is used for massive power attacks which drains your power. Power in the game is indicated by a power bar, which can be restored using abilities to the player, or by just simply waiting for the power bar to fill. Magic in the game including abilities use mana, and a points called action points. Action points in the game are earned through killing enemy players. To block in the game players need to press the control key.
Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 5600+ 2.8 GHz
Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4870

Title: Kingdom Wars
short_description: A free to play 3D MMORTS with real-time siege combat.
Description:
Kingdom Wars is a free to play 3D MMORTS developed by Reverie World Studios, Inc. Battle your way through the amazing online world with real-time siege combat as you construct strongholds, command citizens, complete quests, and manage a gigantic empire.

Manage a persistent kingdom and economy with thousands of other players as you socialize, trade, create alliances, and compete against other players across the world. Start wars with your neighbors and complete hundreds of hours of quests.

Participate in the two different single player modes: open-ended Campaign mode and single-player Skirmish mode that has Lay Siege and Castle Defense maps to test your skills before you go take on real opponents.

Construct a unique base from hundreds of different Stronghold features and buildings that look and behave like a City-Simulation game, but you don’t have to participate in any micromanagement. Each race also has their own unique buildings that only that can build for their Strongholds.

Explore the 3D dynamic World Map and you traverse the MMORTS world. It features scale replicas of all the NPC strongholds, quest areas, and the player’s home. The world also has realistic weather changes and season changes and you economy reacts to how the weather is behaving and what season it is.

Kingdom Wars is a free to play MMORTS that offers real-time siege combat along with constructing strongholds, commanding citizens, completing quests, and managing your gigantic empire all while trying to protect it from other players and expand it at the same time.
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 530 / ATI Radeon HD 6570

Title: Champions of Regnum
short_description: A free to play, realm versus realm fantasy MMORPG.
Description:
Champions of Regnum is a free to play, realm versus realm fantasy MMORPG published by NGD Studios. Fight over forts, castles, and create your own realm with the strong PvP experience that the game provides. Make use of NPC guards and even dragons as you fight to take control of the six gems and be granted a wish by the golden dragon.

PvP has a strong focus in Champions of Regnum. You can choose to take part in round-the-clock territorial wars, open PvP, or arena battles each with their own rewards and prestige associated with them. Every gem that you claim for your own realm will grant you a wish that can be used to negatively affect other realms or grant yours a bonus.

Choose between multiple disciplines and after you have leveled up choose to specialize into one of the unique builds that discipline offers. You can level up in many different ways: gaining experience through quests, grinding, capturing territory, or delivering letters for your realm.

Another great thing many people will overlook is that Champions of Regnum is not hard on computers so most people using a modern computer should be able to run the game, even Linux users shouldn’t have a problem.

Make your realm stronger by gathering gems to ask the golden dragon to grant you a wish, or use that wish to negatively affect your enemy’s realms.
Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 and 256 MB RAM: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or ATI 2600

Title: Star Conflict
short_description: A free to play action-packed MMO space simulation game.
Description:
Gaijin Entertainment, the company behind War Thunder, takes the combat into space in its free-to-play space MMO game Star Conflict. Choose from multiple space craft units and man your battle stations as you fly around in nicely detailed space environments and try to take down your opponents using a variety of special abilities and weaponry.

Following a similar progression tree as War Thunder, Star Conflict focuses on tactical based third person shooting and PvP. After each match, players are awarded credits and experience and can use both to upgrade and research every aspect of their fleet from weapons to actual space craft. After researching and upgrading, players can swap out parts on their spacecraft adding more armor to lighter attack ships, more firepower to smaller ships, or generally customize their favorite ship to be a freak of space nature on the battlefield.

While Star Conflict is primarily a team based PvP game, players do have the option of taking on quests (also available in PvP play as secondary objectives) and some PvE content geared towards both group and solo play. Since players will be joining one of three factions at the start of their space career, each faction has different objectives based on their faction’s needs. Certain spacecraft are even faction specific.

With detailed environments, a deep progression system, a multitude of spacecraft to choose from, and a cash shop similar to War Thunder’s, Star Conflict provides players with a top notch space combat simulator and encourages players to form up into alliances and create corporations that can control sections of the galaxy through combat domination.

Star Conflict is available for PC, Mac, and Linux platforms.
Processor: 2.0 GHz, Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon II
Graphics: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)

Title: Rail Nation
short_description: A free to play 2D browser-based train simulation strategy MMO game.
Description:
Rail Nation is a free to play 2D browser-based train simulation strategy MMO game, published by Travian Games and developed by Bright Future. Rail Nation offers players the ability to choose between the opposing factions Eastern Atlantic Railway or the Western Pacific Railroad, each seeking to control the rail system and expand their network of trains as they progress through the game.

Players initially pick a hub city and start with a basic train route. Then they must gather resources by planning their routes, delivering goods and building additional tracks to connect their network to more and more American cities.
