After starting with steam engines, players can research more advance technologies and upgrade to diesel and electric trains to enhance their networks’ capabilities.

This train simulation game spans across six eras as server time passes. Eras last two weeks, and will progress as server time passes, regardless of whether people are actively playing. The game’s cities are composed of groups of players, and the final era is a competition between the 10 top-ranked cities. Each era offers more trains to choose from and subsequently more ways to deliver goods for profit. Players can build and upgrade structures in their train station houses including a laboratories, lottery buildings and engine sheds. The game boasts historical accuracy, a decent player base and loads of content to keep players engaged.

Title: Epic Cards Battle
short_description: A free to play online strategic trading card game with dozens of cards and five factions.
Description:
Epic Cards Battle is a free to play online strategic trading card game (TCG) from momoStorm Entertainment. Only the players who collect the strongest cars and assemble the most powerful decks will emerge victorious.

Using cunning strategy, players will assemble their decks through cards bought or collected in the Campaign in Epic Cards Battle. There is five factions and 3 kinds of card types: Unit, Spell, Trigger. Players must choose their tactics wisely, as they will have no input into how battles between NPCs and other players play out.

Players can purchase cards in Epic Cards Battle with Rubies, the in-game currency, or they can pay money for Diamonds and get access to some of the most powerful cards in the game.

Building a strong deck is the key to success in Epic Cards Battle, so choose carefully before the battles commence. Epic Cards Battle is available on PC as well as iOS and Android.

Title: Age of Wushu
short_description: A free-to-play martial arts action MMORPG with a large open world and sandbox-like features.
Description:
Age of Wushu by Snail Games (“Age of Wulin by Webzen” in other global regions) is a free-to-play Wuxia inspired MMORPG that focuses on delivering a large open world while offering sandbox-like features. New players will take the role of an aspiring martial arts expert and will choose one of 8 schools. The school you choose will alter what skills your character will learn (and become more proficient at) over time and learning these skill “books” is the game’s primary advancement technique as Age of Wushu eschews the traditional “leveling” mechanics found in other MMOs. Your chosen school also determines the weapon type your character will use.

Age of Wushu has been developed using a proprietary engine called “FLEXI.” This engine allows the game to maintain a higher graphical performance and makes updates to technology easier to implement in game by simply adding new modules to the engine rather than upgrading the entire engine itself.

Combat in Age of Wushu is a bit different than other MMORPGs. Combat takes on a more “rock-paper-scissors” mentality. Skills are categorized as “Overt” damage skills, “Feint” defense-breaking skills, and “Block” defensive skills. There are secondary “Chi” (energy) draining skills outside of these three categories but combat primarily revolves around using the right skill type at the right type to react to PvE and PvP threats. Movement skills, including gliding, jumping, and water walking, make the game’s combat reminiscent of martial arts movie action scenes.

While Age of Wushu features traditional MMORPG features like questing, PvP, an in game marketplace, and a story that’s been expanded through multiple game expansions, the game is maybe most well-known for some of its more unique features. The “Offline Mode” allows players to advance their characters in some ways while not actually playing the game. Assigning your character duties in shops, school, or other locations while you are offline can net your character benefits when you return to the game. The other side of that feature, though, allows players in game to kidnap offline players for gains of their own. In game, players can also use systems like the “Criminal System” to place bounties on other players.

Age of Wushu brings some unique items to the MMO game space but may not be a hit with all players. It is certainly a game that benefits from playing for free for a bit prior to spending money on something that may not be your “cup of tea.”

Title: Everquest
short_description: A fantasy MMORPG nearly two decades in the making. In fact, it’s the game that started it all!
Description:
EverQuest is a fantasy MMORPG nearly two decades in the making. In fact, it’s the game that started it all! No other MMORPG matches EverQuest’s content that includes 18 expansions, plus the original game. You are about to see what 16 years of continuous development of content can do for an online MMORPG.

Developed and published by the team at Daybreak Games, EverQuest continues to add content and worlds full of mystery and adventure. EverQuest is currently free to Play, you will join a community that is unlike any other, as you immerse yourself in hundreds of battle zones, battling thousands of creatures, and complete quests with your friends.

When playing EverQuest, you will be able to take advantage of the character system, customize your character with thousands of alternate abilities and build up through over 90 levels of power. In EverQuest, there are over 50,000 items you are able to collect and earn, and you are even able to hire and control unique mercenaries to aid you in your adventures. The in game marketplace is pretty impressive as well, as it contains potions, weapons, armor, and mounts!

EverQuest is best enjoyed with friends, but you are still able to play Solo. If you ​are ​playing with friends though, you have options to play in groups and raid across continents filled with dungeons, crypts, floating landscapes, and underwater adventures. You can even participate in several seasonal and holiday events throughout the year. Are you ready to join the game that started it all, nearly two decades ago?

Title: Mabinogi
short_description: A free-to-play adventure MMORPG where you can create a unique character and live your fantasy life.
Description:
Mabinogi is a free-to-play adventure MMORPG developed by devCAT and published by multiple companies throughout the world. Initially released in Korea in 2004, Mabinogi is loosely based on Irish mythology and sports a very unique anime art style that uses hand drawn images and sharp image outlining. While the game is an MMORPG and has features like dungeons, quests, and leveling, the game is now more well known for its social and fashion aspects.

With the ability to do almost anything you want to do in game (literally, you can write music if you want to), Mabinogi allows players to truly play the game they want to play… even if that game involves consuming the thousands of fashion items added to the game. While each update has added to the game’s main story threads, players are free to explore and live their own personal fantasy life if they wish… the RPG elements of the game aren’t even required in some cases.

For those looking to take on quests, monsters, dungeons, and other traditional MMO content, fret not as Mabinogi offers plenty of that as well. PvP and duels are available in special areas of the game’s vast and beautiful world.

It is important to note that this game has been shut down in some parts of the world and your ability to play on alternate servers may depend on your geographic location due to some countries being blocked by their region.
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.8Ghz Memory: 2 GB
Graphics: GeForce 7900 GS / ATI Radeon X1950 Pro
Storage: At least 8 GB of free space

Title: Stormfall: Age of War
short_description: A free to play 2D top-down browser MMORTS featuring castle building, resource management and PvP battles.
Description:
Stormfall: Age of War is a free to play 2D top-down browser MMORTS featuring castle building, resource management and PvP battles. Published by Plarium, Stormfall: Age of War allows players to expand their medieval castles with upgradable structures and troops. In this browser-based game, players take on the role of Darkshine’s champion, tasked with reunited the broken kingdoms that compose the remnants of Stormfall, the once legendary empire. Lord Oberon, your sarcastic, voice-acted narrator, will serve as your guide to the land of Darkshine and task you with various objectives.

Stormfall: Age of War is a free to play 2D top-down browser MMORTS featuring castle building, resource management and PvP battles. Published by Plarium, Stormfall: Age of War allows players to expand their medieval castles with upgradable structures and troops. In this browser-based game, players take on the role of Darkshine’s champion, tasked with reunited the broken kingdoms that compose the remnants of Stormfall, the once legendary empire. Lord Oberon, your sarcastic, voice-acted narrator, will serve as your guide to the land of Darkshine and task you with various objectives.

Darkshine is constantly plagued by territorial disputes. Through utilizations of the game’s League system, you can create or join leagues of fellow players. As the king of your stronghold, you must use your military units to defend your base, raid enemy bases and engage in group warfare, battling enemy leagues. Reinforce your castles defense to produce resources, attract additional unit s and expand your army. Players can also indulge in the Lost Arts by obtaining ancient scrolls to create new structures and gain access to new, trainable units. The Lost Arts also grant players war contraptions and beasts to deploy against enemies.

Title: PlanetSide 2
short_description: A free-to-play open-world FPS that pits three factions against each other in a never-ending war.
Description:
Daybreak Game Company’s PlanetSide 2 is a free-to-play open-world FPS that pits three factions against each other in a never-ending war for dominance of the planet Auraxis. Utilizing Daybreak’s next-gen ForgeLight engine, PlanetSide 2 offers a wide-open FPS experience and tons of choices to determine where and how you fight, not only as an individual soldier, but as part of a larger team fighting for your chosen faction.

Each soldier belongs to one of three factions: the militaristic and rigid Terran Republic, the rebellious and independent New Conglomerate, or the tech-savvy and futuristic Vanu Sovereignity. There are six classes in the game, each with its own strengths and weaknesses, and players can freely swap their characters between those classes to suit their current task. The game also boasts several vehicles, ranging from tanks and armored personnel carriers to futuristic fighter jets and flying troop transports, so you never know just what you’ll be up against. You can fill a role as a driver or pilot, support your allies with healing or ammunition, or just get behind a big gun and blow people away.

Battle across the continents of Auraxis is a base-hopping affair, with each of the three factions striving to control the most territory by attacking enemy bases and defending their own. There are a number of different facilities, requiring coordination from infantry, armor, and air forces to conquer. Sometimes, efficient strategy and tactics win the day, and other times, a simple full-on direct assault will do the trick.

As you play, you’ll earn certifications you can use to buy new weapons and passive abilities for your characters and your vehicles, or you can buy them with real money. Different pieces of equipment offer different but equivalent capabilities, such as increasing damage while reducing rate of fire, or fulfilling other specialized roles, so as to prevent the game from being pay-to-win.
Processor: Core i5-760 or better / AMD Phenom II X4 or better [Quad-core CPU]
Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 260 or better / Radeon HD 4850 or better

Title: AirMech
short_description: A free to play Action RTS with MOBA elements.
Description:
AirMech is a fast­-paced action-packed RTS with MOBA elements (like Dota or Starcraft), allowing you to battle on the ground or command from the skies. Developed and published by Carbon Games, AirMech allows you to practice solo, or try your hand at co­op and PvP modes. You will be able to play 1v1, 2v2 or 3v3 ­ and that doesn’t even count the army that you’ve build to fight alongside you!

When you’re building your army in AirMech, you’re able to choose which units you want to lead you into battle and help you claim victory! You can even unlock custom Variant AirMechs, which are skins for your character, which have a unique look while you’re in the game. Speaking of in­game, AirMech lets you choose from many different game modes. Choose to play PvP, co­op or against the in­game AI. AirMech’s Survival Mode even allows teams of up to 4 players to work together to fight off incoming hordes of enemies. You can also pick one of the Challenge modes that allows you to test your skills in time trials!

AirMech is an easy to play DotA-­style game that takes place in a futuristic world, where the last survivors of the Great War continue to fight with the ultimate war machine ­ known as the AirMech. It was created out of lost technology, and pilots have found, salvaged or stolen the AirMechs that they are able to find, and use them to either protect the weak, or to pillage and steal. In AirMech, you’re up against transforming robots that each have their own unique stats and abilities. You’ll be in for a fast-­paced action experience that features shorter game lengths to keep each battle intense! The game supports a mouse and keyboard, as well as an Xbox 360 gamepad. Your controls can also be completely customized to allow for a totally personal gameplay experience.

Title: Big Farm
short_description: A friendly browser-based farming simulation MMO game!
Description:
GoodGame Big Farm is a free to play browser-based 2D multiplayer farming simulation game. The fun is always fresh and the lessons homegrown in Goodgame Studios’ Big Farm! This casual strategy game is a perfect MMO game for all ages to enjoy!

Big Farm starts out by telling you that dear old Uncle George has left you his beloved farm. Unfortunately, as much as Uncle George loved the farm, he couldn’t take care of it like he wanted to. It’s up to you to take control of this decrepit farmyard and turn it into something Uncle George would have been proud of!

If you’ve played games like FarmVille or Empire then the mechanics of Big Farm will feel like greeting an old friend again. You’ll use your smarts to repair the farm and make it shine. Along with help from your family and nearby neighbors, you’ll turn economics to your advantage and learn what it takes to make a farm a prosperous piece of land.

Throwing in the adorable graphics of the farm buildings, the crops, and the animals, it’s easy to see why Goodgame Big Farm is an amusing and addictive strategy game. Don’t waste any more time in the city! Head out to the fields and turn Uncle George’s dream into reality in Big Farm!

Title: Wartune
short_description: A 2D browser-based Strategy MMORPG with classic turn based RPG features.
Description:
Published by R2 Games, Wartune is a 2D browser-based strategy MMO with classic RPG elements to deliver an interesting experience. Your gameplay experience is shaped by your choice of class. Classes include knights, mages and archers. The game features strategic city-building and turn-based combat, both PvE and PvP.

The game boasts a high player base, special events, daily quests and massive, thousand-player boss battles. Featuring single and multiplayer dungeons, Wartune requires players to expand their cities by obtaining resources and creating structures.

Title: Pirate 101
short_description: A free to play Pirate-themed MMORPG designed with kids in mind.
Description:
Pirate 101 is a free to play 3D Pirate-themed MMORPG designed with kids in mind, and attempts to bring families together by providing exciting gameplay for adults and kids alike.

The universe of Spiral is made up of Several different worlds, and every world in Spiral has multiple areas for you to explore. They have a unique way of categorizing their game by the use of “books” and “chapters”. Although the game is Free to Play, in order to play certain Chapters, you must purchase them with “Crowns”, which is the in-game premium currency for Pirate 101. There is also a membership plan that allows the user to have limited-time access to every chapter in the game, during their timed subscription.

Some of the major ways Pirate 101 maintains its kid-friendly atmosphere is by limited player interaction, and having parental controls set in place. There are three different chat modes in Pirate 101, each with a different level of restrictions. Another interesting tidbit; Pirate 101 takes place in the same universe as Wizard 101, which is also known for its family-friendly style of gameplay.

Pirate 101 is a free to play 3D Pirate-themed MMORPG designed with kids in mind, and attempts to bring families together by providing exciting gameplay for adults and kids alike.

The universe of Spiral is made up of Several different worlds, and every world in Spiral has multiple areas for you to explore. They have a unique way of categorizing their game by the use of “books” and “chapters”. Although the game is Free to Play, in order to play certain Chapters, you must purchase them with “Crowns”, which is the in-game premium currency for Pirate 101. There is also a membership plan that allows the user to have limited-time access to every chapter in the game, during their timed subscription.

Some of the major ways Pirate 101 maintains its kid-friendly atmosphere is by limited player interaction, and having parental controls set in place. There are three different chat modes in Pirate 101, each with a different level of restrictions. Another interesting tidbit; Pirate 101 takes place in the same universe as Wizard 101, which is also known for its family-friendly style of gameplay.

Players travel through Spiral on a Flying Pirate ship which can be completely customized, from the cannons you use all the way down to the anchor. There are over 50 different companions in the game, which you can use in combat to provide you with the edge you need in order to defeat your foes. With its turn-based combat and whimsical voice-acting, Pirate 101 really is a game that the whole family can enjoy!

Title: Dino Storm
short_description: A free-to-play 3D MMO with cowboys, dinosaurs, and laser guns.
Description:
Dino Storm is a unique free-to-play 3D MMO with RPG elements that gives players cowboys, dinosaurs, and lasers… oh my! Players looking for all-out, nonsensical and entertaining gameplay will want to try Dino Storm.

Dino Storm is like the Old West, only cowboys ride dinosaurs instead of horses and fire lasers instead of bullets. And just like any cowboy worth their spurs, Dino Storm features a unique fame system that helps players build a name for themselves.

The dinosaur is the player’s trusted mount in Dino Storm, and it’s their best friend out in the wilderness. Players will take on hundreds of quests with their Jurassic steed right by their side. There’s also the option to join bands of other laser-shooting player cowboys and take on the challenges together.

Players will protect the towns from vicious outlaws in Dino Storm, and danger is never far from any player who is looking to do what’s right with a laser in one hand while riding atop a dinosaur.

Dino Storm was born from a unique combination and it looks like the creativity of this game is anything but extinct.

Title: The Settlers Online
short_description: A free to play city building MMORTS based on the popular Settlers series.
Description:
The Settlers Online: Castle Empire is a free to play 2D browser based city building MMORTS, developed and published by Ubisoft, players can construct their own cities from and manage its population. This strategy game features an in-depth resource-management system that requires players to think carefully about how they use their materials. To expand your initially pitiful, barren island into a thriving city, you must recruit specialists from your tavern to fend of bandits and explore new territory. Resources are far from infinite; players will constantly have to explore in order to expand their settlement.

Unlike other resource-management games, The Settlers Online: Castle Empire features an interesting economic system that requires players to foster an effective city infrastructure and pay close attention to the economic aspects of their settlements. The strategy game features a decent player base, high-quality graphics and a myriad of quests to complete in order to progress through the game. You can also trade resources with other players, or take control of other player’s cities.

Title: Continent of the Ninth Seal
short_description: A free MMORPG where players take part as heroes of Glenheim to stand together against Nefer.
Description:
The Continent of the Ninth Seal (C9), is a free to play fantasy MMORPG with action combat, where players take part as heroes of Glenheim to stand together against Nefer. C9 showcases stunning graphics, fast-paced action combat, strategic gameplay and a gripping story line. Does battling an evil villain who is trying to open a gate to the netherworld and swarm the land with his infernal legion sound like fun? You’ll do exactly that in The Continent of the Ninth Seal

When you play C9 you’ll choose a character that best represents how you want to experience the game. You’ll start by choosing from four base classes ­ Fighter, Hunter, Shaman or Witchblade ­ and can upgrade each into multiple advanced classes, each unique in their skills, visuals and styles of gameplay. With console­ like controls and various skill combinations, C9 is a satisfying choice for all fans of action games.

C9 features a unique MMORPG experience; with it’s non ­targeting combat, you don’t have to worry about locking onto a single enemy! In fact, this unique system has even earned C9 five awards, including the Grand Game Award in Korea in 2009. Precise, customizable controls ­ using either a mouse and keyboard, or a gamepad ­ allow you to control your character and even determine their fate. You will no longer experience hand­ cramping, from pushing the same four buttons again and again, because your hands will never be at rest during combat. With enough skill and practice, you can learn how control your enemies so successfully, they’ll have to chance to fight back.

As if complete control and domination weren’t enough, C9 also allows you to enhance your items, build guild housing, craft items and remodel equipment­ all popular features for any great RPG game! The game also features a unique Legend system, that displays your in­game achievements and expresses your character’s personality to other players.

What do you say? Do you have what it takes to defeat Nefer and save the world from his legion?
Processor: Intel Single Core 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon XP 2400+

Title: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
short_description: The popular multiplayer shooter from Valve.
Description:
Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is the popular multi-player shooter from Valve. One of the most popular games in esports, CSGO is primarily an objective-based shooter wherein two teams compete in a variety of game modes to complete an objectives ranging from defusing a bomb to rescuing hostages.

There are nine game modes, including: competitive, casual, deathmatch, arms race, demolition, wingman, flying scountsman, weapons course, and (most recently) a battle royale mode titled Danger Zone. As with most competitive online shooters, CSGO supports matchmaking.

Due to the long life of the game, players have a wide selection of weapons to choose from when playing. The game also offers a solid spectator mode.
Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0

Title: Gotham City Impostors
short_description: A free to play multiplayer FPS that pits vigilantes dressed up like Batman against criminals dressed up like the Joker
Description:
Gotham City Impostors is a free to play multiplayer First Person Shooter (FPS) that pits vigilantes dressed up like Batman against criminals dressed up like the Joker in open warfare on the streets of Gotham City

Gotham City Impostors does not have rigid character classes and lets you play the way you want. You’ll be able to choose the guns, gadgets and even the hairdos that fit your personality and play style. It doesn’t matter if you want to be a mighty muscleman on roller skates or a lithe lassie packing a rocket launcher.

Gotham City Impostors features a robust leveling up system that lets you unlock all the items required to make your impostor as crazy as you desire. Whether you prefer to develop your impostor by proving your prowess in solo challenges designed to test your skills and reflexes or by battling your way to the top of the scoreboard in several over­-the-­top multiplayer modes.

Gotham City has gone insane! Batman is up to his pointy ears in unwanted “helpers” who are determined to dish out their own blood thirsty brand of vigilante justice in his name (and image). Meanwhile, a small army of self appointed junior Jokerz have turned the streets of Gotham into a barmy battlefield of bullets, bodies, and bear traps. As you can probably tell, this might not end well.

Title: RPG MO
short_description: A nostalgic free MMORPG reminiscent of old-school RPG's like Ultima and Runescape.
Description:
RPG MO is a free-to-play retro-style sandbox MMORPG featuring pixilated graphics and wide, colorful world in which players can level up various combat abilities, or take a break from the hack-and-slash and focus on crafting skills. This 2D open-world MMORPG is available on PC via browser, client and Steam. RPG MO is also available on smartphones and tablets.

RPG MO is a nostalgic sandbox experience reminiscent of old-school RPG’s like Ultima and Runescape. In combat, players can switch between various stances to level different skills. Collect powerful weapons and armor and train melee skills to become a formidable warrior, or put down the sword and level magic skills to discover new, dangerous spells.

Additionally, players can take on the role of a merchant collecting materials through mining and chopping wood to level crafting abilities and create valuable items to sell to other players. The game boasts a wide range of over a dozen skills players can train in with no level caps. Players can choose to specialize, focusing on specific skills, or level them all up. Players can also build their own homes, which are visible to other players.

The game offers various PvE quests, and allows players to collaborate with each other for group dungeon quests. Players can also fight each other in PvP zones. Boasting a large, loyal player base and consistent updates, RPG MO serves as a fun, addicting does of pixilated nostalgia.

Title: Realm of the Mad God
short_description: A fast paced 2d free to play MMO shooter game with a retro 8-bit style.
Description:
Realm of the Mad God is a fast paced 2d free to play MMO shooter game with a retro 8-bit style and RPG elements. Need something for some quick fun in a browser, on Steam, or through a direct download? Realm of the Mad God may be just the distraction you need. Now under Kabam’s banner, Realm of the Mad God brings the “bullet hell” experience to the MMO front and challenges players to kill quest monsters in its pixelated world.

While not graphically intense, Realm of the Mad God delivers in game intensity through increasingly difficult zones that challenge players to take on one of many classes (unlocked through gameplay) and dodge and fire your way to success. Gather experience and equipment and seek out rare monsters for a chance at epic drops or access to rare event dungeons. Realm of the Mad God can get repetitive, but since the game uses a permadeath mechanic, when you’re low on health your heart will be racing. Die and you lose everything except the Fame you’ve gathered and any items you’ve stored in your small vault.

The game’s cash shop does feature equipment including high end gear but since the game is PvE focused these items are only necessary for those players that want a boost up or want to bring a bit more to their group’s performance. Dodge, shoot, and earn your way towards higher and higher Fame so you can unlock more of the game’s features. But be warned, if you want to check out that class you just unlocked, death may be your only option so plan accordingly.

Title: Pirates: Tides of Fortune
short_description: A free to play browser-based 2D MMORTS for people who are fans of pirates!
Description:
Pirates: Tides of Fortune is a free to play browser-based 2D MMORTS developed by Plarium. Players begin the strategy MMO game with an upgradeable island and a handful of resource points to put into their gold and lumber facilities. As you progress through the game and earn more resources, you can expand your island with several different structures like rum distilleries. These distilleries are paramount in progressing through the game, rum being of obvious importance to pirates. To get resources, players can either create their own, or raid other players for their booty. Additionally, flotsam (pieces from a shipwreck) can be collected from around the shores of players’ islands, which can contain every available resource in the game. This serves as a nice means of burning time while players wait to finish researching technologies or completing new structures.

From the world map, players can see shipwrecks to salvage and other islands to pillage. Some will make for easy prey, but landlubbers beware: some will be defended by captains from neighboring islands. Troops, which are needed to attack other players, can be obtained from the tavern once it’s built. Players with the necessary resource like gold and rum can deploy their pirate fleet comprising both offensive and defensive troops. They each serve a distinct purpose, and certain missions will call for one or the other.

Once a player has attacked another player, they will appear on each other’s “enemy list.” Players can attack people on their list as much as they please, provided they have the resources. Players can also attack certain points held by other players such as stashes of gems or gold. Each point has an expiration date that ticks ever closer while it is occupied. Additionally, if a player is part of an alliance, they can deploy troops to protect points held by their friends to ensure it is not successfully plundered before the timer runs out. Players can research defensive technologies and build certain structures like walls to protect their strongholds from enemy attacks.

Title: Star Wars: The Old Republic
short_description: A 3D sci-fi MMORPG based on the popular Star Wars universe and brought to you by Bioware.
Description:
Star Wars: The Old Republic is a 3D sci-fi MMORPG based on the popular Star Wars universe and brought to you by Bioware. Star Wars: The Old Republic allows players to become one of several different iconic classes including Jedi, Sith, and Troopers, with a variety of species to choose from. Each class follows their own unique custom storyline which contains a number of dynamic questions allowing players to become immersed in their character’s progression and ultimately choose their own destiny.

Players choose to join either the Galactic Republic or the Sith Empire. The game is set more than 3,500 years prior to the films and allows players to visit and interact with some classic environments such as the planets Tatooine and Coruscant. While each class may favor a certain playstyle (tank, DPS, or healer) customization options along with companion characters allow the individual player to adapt to a number of situations without relying on the support of other players. Character appearance customization is limited to a few slide bar choices but further options are available through the cash shop with the use of Cartel Coins.

Character leveling and progression is done through the standard missions, exploration, and defeating enemies. New skills are learned at each level and are taught by trainers in a number of locations. There are heroic missions that require the cooperation of other players and can typically be repeated on a daily basis. Leveling has been vastly accelerated to encourage players to jump into the game’s more recent expansions.

One of the more unique features about Star Wars: The Old Republic is that the dynamic choices players make can permanently open or close parts of the story line and can affect the player’s NPC companions and any relationships you may have with those companions.

Crafting in Star Wars: The Old Republic is a much more passive activity than the typical MMORPG, NPC companions carry out the gathering and crafting activates as assigned by the player while the player is participating in active adventures. A player can assign up to 5 companions to perform 3 different skills.

Star Wars: The Old Republic has taken some heat for a somewhat restrictive cash shop. In fact, some of the features mentioned above may be hidden behind a “cash wall” The game does still offer a subscription for players who prefer that experience.
Processor: Intel Pentium Dual Core G6960 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 B75 or better
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 465 GTX / ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better

Title: No More Room in Hell
short_description: A free to play cooperative FPS survival horror mod for the Source Engine.
Description:
No More Room in Hell is a free to play cooperative FPS survival horror mod for the Source Engine, and focuses on survival in an “of the Dead” type universe loosely based on Romero’s famous work. The multiplayer co-op game play has been likened more to a survival horror game than a typical first person shooter, but the game relies on typical first person mechanics.

Fight your way with friends through multiple mission types and objectives while trying to avoid becoming infected by zombies yourself. Should you become infected, do you warn your teammates or keep quiet and hope your situation improves? The choice is yours. Speaking up could earn you a quick death at the hands of your own teammates.

Players are able to modify their server rules and can make the game more realistic by not using typical gameplay features like a HUD or even crosshairs. Even voice chat and text chat is limited by distance so keep your friends close. While some servers opt for unlimited ammo, the traditional gameplay keeps things dire by providing very little ammo and a sense of dread as zombies of different varieties close on your location. Some are fast, some may be slow, and in the end, it may not be a zombie that is the most dangerous to you.

Being a mod, No More Room in Hell is constantly being added to and improved and many more features are slated to be released this year to improve the look, feel, and addictiveness of the game. While the game can get repetitive at times, No More Room in Hell is a pleasant diversion and one that is likely to keep getting better over time.
Developer: No More Room in Hell Team
Graphics: ATI Radeon 9600 or nVidia GeForce 8 series

Title: Digimon Masters Online
short_description: A free to play 3D MMORPG based on the popular Digimon franchise.
Description:
Digimon Masters Online (DMO) is a free to play MMORPG set in the Digimon universe that allows you to collect different Digimon and battle with them throughout the vast Digimon anime universe. Players will control one of the four main Tamers from the Digimon Data Squad and you will adventure out into the Digimon world.

You are able to choose from one of the four main Tamers of the Digimon Data Squad: Marcus Damon, Thomas H. Norstein, Yoshino Fujieda, and Keenan Crier. Although the avatar is one of the four main Tamers from the anime series you are able to customize your name and modify the appearance of the Avatar. Once you select your Tamer you are allowed to choose a Partner Digimon, your main Digimon throughout the game.

You are able to acquire more Digimon besides your Partner Digimon by hatching Mercenary Digimon from Digi-Eggs using an incubator. These Mercenary Digimon will help you in battles and quests along your path through the Digi-World.

Battling is done in real-time in Digimon Masters, your Digimon will battle other Digimon using special attacks that use up their Digi-soul meter, the energy, in battle. If your Digi-soul meter runs low, then you will only be able to use standard attacks during the rest of the battle. If another player happens to come by your battle since they are happening in real time they are able to join in and assist you, or they can just sit back and watch you suffer.

Title: Dragon Nest
short_description: A free-to-play action MMORPG with non-targeting combat.
Description:
Dragon Nest is a free-to-play action MMORPG with non-targeting combat developed by Eyedentity Games and published by various publishers based on your location on the globe. (Please Note: Due to the wide variety of publishers, not all versions of Dragon Nest have the same current version or update schedule.)

In Dragon Nest, players select from a number of pre-created heroes that have various skill sets (specializing in magic, ranged, melee, etc) and play through a series of instance based “dungeons” to level, learn new skills, and gain fame and fortune. What the game lacks in character creation options (you really only customize color and clothing) the game makes up for in its more action and arcade style combat. Players will be challenged in combat (you can adjust difficulty) and will require lightning fast reactions and intelligent use of skill combinations to take down their foes…even other players. This makes combat (and PvP) more of a skill based encounter where skill can trump character level.

Dragon Nest is well known for its epic boss battles. Expect to see big monsters and creatures that will challenge the way players approach each fight. Aim true, if you don’t you’ll spend a lot of time missing.

Stunning visuals and smooth animations will keep players visually enthralled while they rack up kill after kill in the game’s constantly changing dungeons. Many players though have bemoaned a recent update that altered the game’s existing content in favor of pushing players into new dungeons tailored to higher levels. The game’s cash shop also garners some criticism with the offering of special in game items in addition to the standard costume/pet fare. Dragon Nest also has inspired some manga, films, and collectible figures.

Title: Mission Against Terror
short_description: A free to play fast-paced lobby-based MMOFPS with lots of game modes and tons of weapons.
Description:
Mission Against Terror is free to play 3D lobby-based MMOFPS with lots of game modes, fast paced gameplay and tons of weapons. Mission Against Terror takes the classic FPS feel and turned it into a MMO. The gameplay draws inspiration from other lobby-based shooters like Counter-strike.

The two major selling points for this first person shooter are their vast amounts of playable maps and the amount of game modes available. Currently there are over 50 maps in Mission Against Terror, and they are constantly adding more every month. Hated playing the same map on repeat when paying a game like Call Of Duty? Well, that feeling will never become an issue with Mission Against Terror, unless you choose to keep playing the same map. Following the same theme of large amounts of content, Mission Against Terror offers a large amount of game modes. Some will be familiar: Team Deathmatch and Deathmatch, made popular by other FPS titles. Where Mission Against Terrors shines is when you get to their unique game modes, like Dragon Emperor Mode and Hide and Seek. It will be hard to get bored with Mission Against Terror, given its large variety of game modes and maps.

Mission Against Terror has simple game controls that anyone can pick up quickly. The combat in the game is fast-paced and is guaranteed to keep your adrenaline pumping. If Cosmetics are your thing, Mission Against Terror offers many different Costumes. Some of them are fancy and give off a cool vibe, and others are just out right ridiculous. Mission Against Terror is a MMOFPS that requires low system requirements and will satisfy your retro gaming needs.

Title: Spiral Knights
short_description: A massively multiplayer online role-playing game, battle monsters and collect treasures!
Description:
Developed by Three Rings and published by SEGA, Spiral Knights is a free to play cooperative adventure game in a persistent world that has a focus on instant, fast­-paced action. You will arm yourself and join the ranks of the Spiral Knights, banding together to fight to the core. Stranded on an alien world, you must explore the ever­ changing clockworks beneath the surface when you join the ranks of the Spiral Knights.

Spiral Knights features cooperative exploration where you will fight monsters, solve puzzles and discover new treasures, together with other players. The Clockworks offer challenges that are best tackled with your friends, so make sure to bring them along! You will be able to go from logging into your account, to being deep into a multiplayer adventure in less than a minute, in Spiral Knights.

Don’t think you will have to settle for ordinary weaponry when you play Spiral Knights. You will be able to to create a totally unique arsenal with hundreds of unique weapons that can you discover and alchemize. Once you have your perfect arsenal ready to go, make sure to join a guild. Guild alliances allow for greater influence over the world, allowing you to amass powerful minerals that will allow you to transform the Clockworks. The best part is that Spiral Knights is free to play, and no subscription is required to enjoy everything that the game has to offer!

If you’re a fan of Team Fortress 2, you will be able to unlock a special Spiral Knights­ themed Team Fortress 2 hat by unlocking an achievement in Spiral Knights. To receive the free Team Fortress 2 hat, players must first reach the Clockwork Terminal from any gate in the Haven Arcade and unlock the Mission Accomplished achievement. If you’ve already unlocked that achievement though, don’t worry ­ you’ll still be able to receive the hay! Let the fun and games begin!
Memory: 512MB for Windows XP or 1GB for Windows Vista/7
Graphics: 64MB Video Memory. GeForce 5 series, ATI Radeon 8500. Latest video driver.

Title: Steel Legions
short_description: A free to play 3d browser based tank game with fast-paced tactical battles!
Description:
Steel Legions is a free to play 3d browser based tank game with fast-paced tactical battles. You take control over a heavy steel Steampunk war machine in an alternative history, where four empires acrimoniously rival for power, land and resources.

Player choose their side and start to either take on missions against players of the other factions to gain their own level. Or they hunt Marauders, which they steal resources from needed to improve and maintain their war machines. Switching between dynamic, fast-paced PvP action, a variety of game modes and long term development makes this browser game a fun installment in PvP online games.

Title: Asda Global
short_description: A 3D anime-inspired fantasy MMORPG and is the successor to the original Asda Story.
Description:
Asda Global is a free to play MMORPG that was developed by MaxOn Soft Corp. One of the main features in Asda Global is finding your Soulmate in-game. Choose from multiple different classes, join guilds, achievement farm, customize your character, and collect pets from around the world.

Go questing with other adventurers in Asda Global and if you end up finding one that seems like you are destined to adventure with, they might be your Soulmate. Become Soulmates with them and receive unique skills and items that will make you stronger than people that are without a Soulmate in Asda Global.

You are able to choose from eight different playable classes that you can customize their appearance, gear, and stats. Customizing your stats comes from the different sowels that you can find in the world that you socket into your equipment, different sowels increase different stats. If you afraid of not looking good or not being able to find a style of clothing that you enjoy wearing on your character have no fear, Asda Global has hundreds of different costumes that allow you to customize your character’s appearance any way you see fit.

Go through the game completing hundreds of the achievements, collecting tons of cute pets, and gathering materials to craft with if you get tired of combat. Each of these things will increase various stats so even if you aren’t participating in combat your character will not fall behind.

Asda Global is a cute anime style MMORPG that has tons of customization and different things for you to do in the world, whether it is combat oriented or just walking around completing achievements and gathering materials there is always something to do.

Title: Brink
short_description:
A free-to-play first-person-shoot developed by Splash 
Damage and published by Bethesda Softworks.
Description:
Brink is a free-to-play first-person-shoot developed by Splash Damage and published by Bethesda Softworks. The game blends, single-player, co-op, and multiplayer modes into a single experience. In Brink, players occupy the Ark, a floating city built by men. The city is on the brink of war, despite being built as a self-sufficient, 100% green habitat.

Brink allows players to customize their characters to create a unique appearance as well as build. Players can fight their way through the single-player campaign or choose to go online and participate in co-op activities or engage in full-blown multiplayer action. Long time FPS players should feel right at home with Brink, as it features a control scheme common to the genre.

Brink is available to play via Steam.
Graphics: NVIDIA 8800GS / ATI Radeon HD 2900 Pro or equivalent

Title: Allods Online
short_description: A fantasy MMORPG that follows more traditional “World of Warcraft-like” MMO traditions.
Description:
Allods Online is a free-to-play, fantasy MMORPG that follows more traditional “World of Warcraft-like” MMO traditions, developed by The Allods Team and currently published by Mail.ru.

Players create a new character by choosing from 1 of 2 factions (The League or The Empire) and from 1 of 8 typical class archetypes. Players level their characters through questing, dungeons, and PvP and choose upgrades in a typical skill tree along the way. Combat is “hotbar” based and uses tab targeting, but Allods Online does offer a more unique ship based combat while searching the game’s large world area called “The Astral.”

Players can build and customize their own ships and use them to access zones that are restricted from accessing any other way. Player versus Player ship combat is also possible. On foot, open world PvP is available provided you are flagged for PvP and you’ve reached at least level 21 and larger scale PvP becomes available at level 60.

PvE players can expect questing (side and story quests), dungeon runs, raids and other typical MMORPG content. Along the way to max level, players will learn skills, take place in the game’s market, learn to use mounts for faster transportation, and unlock other character gains. Players can also take on pets and customize them.

On the payment side of things, Allods Online has gone through its own trials over the years. A few missteps with high cash shop prices, a brutally penalizing death mechanic, and a few items of questionable offering all led to a rather large player base backlash. These items have since been changed or removed entirely but the “stigma” still remains in some ways.

Allods is free-to-play but offers a separate subscription based server that is entirely devoid of cash shop influences should players prefer that type of experience.
Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 250 with 512MB of VRAM

Title: Elsword
short_description: A Free to Play 3D side scrolling action MMORPG with many heroes.
Description:
Enter the colorful, anime inspired world of side scrolling action combat in KOG Games free-to-play manga themed MMORPG Elsword. Take on the role of one of many different heroes (new heroes or new versions of existing heroes are added fairly frequently) and swing or cast your way through dungeons and big boss fights alone or with groups of friends. PvP comes in multiple forms staring at 1v1 and extending to group based brawls where the fast based combo action flashes all over your screen.

While Elsword doesn’t feature much in the way of character creation since you are choosing from a list of predefined heroes, you are able to customize your character a bit on the looks front and after leveling a bit (to level 15) you can specialize the skill set your character uses into one of multiple skill trees. Some characters are even combinations of more than one character with the player choosing which character to control in a given situation.

Each character has its own unique backstory, motivations, and storyline so playing through multiple characters is certainly something many players do each time a new character is introduced.

Elsword’s cash shop specializes in costumes for all heroes, accessories, consumable items for in game boosts, pets, mounts, and various items that can be used to add new inventory slots and other “quality of life” improvements.

Title: DC Universe Online
short_description: A free-to-play, comics based MMORPG set in the popular DC Comics universe.
Description:
DC Universe Online (DCUO) is a free-to-play, comics based MMORPG developed by Daybreak Game Company (formerly Sony Online Entertainment.) Start your adventure by creating your very own superhero or villain, complete with various superpowers, and then team up with iconic DC Comic characters like Batman, The Joker, and others to complete your “training” as a new resident of this hero infested world.

While DCUO sports many traditional MMORPG systems, the game also has a more unique interface specifically designed for an MMO that spans both PC and console platforms, and one that lends itself very well to controller play.

PvE content is explored primarily through the use of story episodes, raids, Duo instances, and Iconic Battles. Following the game’s DLC story additions, DCUO allows players to fly, sprint, and brawl their way through memorable locations such as Gotham City, Metropolis, and others all while assisting well known DC Universe characters throughout the DLC story. DCUO is a free-to-play title, but additional DLC does come at a cost for those that do not opt for the monthly subscription fee. These additional content items (episodes) can be purchased individually as can additional character slots and other in-game items.

On the PvP side of content, DCUO provides two primary PvP options: Arenas and Legends. Matches come in the 1v1, 2v2, 4v4, 5v5, and 8v8 variety. Legends PvP allows players to assume the role of pre-balanced iconic DC characters regardless of the player’s actual character level or faction affiliation. This mode is a nice way for players to farm PvP currency without having to wait until they level but some heroes and villains are locked and require either a cash purchase or unlocking with PvP currency. Arenas are the more standard PvP option allowing players to take their individual characters into the fray. Open world PvP is available provided that the player has entered a PvP server.

DCUO is available on PC and the Playstation 4 and Playstation 3 gaming consoles.
Storage: 30 GB of Free Hard Drive Space

Title: Bloodline Champions
short_description: Free-to-Play Moba game where players engage in short battles of up to ten players divided into two teams.
Description:
Bloodline Champions is a free to play 3D MOBA-like game published by Funcom. Participate in multiple game modes that are fast paced and can be played solo or with a team. It varies from other MOBAs by making it more of a skill-focused game instead of grinding for gold and items.

Join in the matchmaking system where you can play quick rounds that last 2-3 minutes each. The matchmaking system supports both solo and team play and has brackets for 2v2s and 3v3s. There are multiple game modes that you can participate in: Arena, a deathmatch style game mode where players kill each other over and over again for points and the team with the most points wins, Capture the Artifact, run to your opponent’s base and pick up their artifact and then run it back to your base without getting killed to score points, and Conquest, control various areas on the map for points and the team with the most points at the end of the match wins.

Instead of grinding out gear like you normally would in a MOBA by killing creeps, gathering gold, and purchasing items, Bloodline Champions makes the genre more skill based. There are no critical hits or passive buffs that your characters can receive and all of your attacks need to be manually aimed, there’s no auto-lock here. Take control of one of the various types of bloodlines each with their own unique weapons and battle your opponents in an easy to learn, hard to master style of game.

Bloodline Champions is a free to play MOBA-like game that offers fast paced rounds, a good selection of characters to play around with, and a good amount of game modes to join in on.
Os: Windows® XP Service Pack 3, Vista, or 7
Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV 3.0 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
Memory: 1GB RAM on Windows XP, 2GB of RAM on Windows Vista/7

Title: GetAmped 2
short_description: A free to play fighting MMO, experience frantic battles up to 20 players.
Description:
GetAmped 2 is a free to play fighting MMO developed by CyberStep, Inc. You will choose from multiple different fighter classes and explore Wingdom city fighting other players. The main focus of GetAmped 2 is PvP but there are PvE aspects as well.

Choose from multiple different playable classes that are all used to smash your opponents face in. Venture through Wingdom city challenges players to PvP battles and using the skills you have learned to battle your way to the top of the leaderboards. Customize your character as you level up with various weapons and accessories that make you even harder to defeat as you advance in experience.

While the real focus of GetAmped 2 is PvP there is a PvE/Cooperative side of gameplay to it as well. You and other players can group up to take on the Guardian mode. Guardian mode is where you group up with four other players and battle against NPCs to try and reach the boss. Once you reach the end of the level and defeat the boss you are rewarded with various prizes that will either help your character advance in skill, or just make them look good.

GetAmped 2 is a free to play fighter MMO that has a strong focus on PvP. Choose from tons of classes that are all focused around fighting and battle other players to be crowned the best PvPer in the city of Wingdom.

Title: Dragon Saga
short_description: A free to play arcade­-style side­-scrolling 3D MMORPG.
Description:
Dragon Saga is a free to play arcade­-style side­-scrolling 3D MMORPG developed and published by Gravity Interactive. In the world of Dragon Saga, you will choose your character from one of six classes ­ Warrior, Mage, Thief, Archer, Shaman or Twin Fighter, and explore a rich world filled with unique monsters. As you progress, you’ll be able to power up and unlock devastating abilities, hidden combos and hilarious skill effects. As you customize your character, those six classes expand into 30 different classes, allowing for nearly unlimited character customization.

The world of Dragon Saga is a land where dragons roam the land and heavens, and where a civilization brimming with extraordinary magical powers also exists. Since the end of the Dragon War, dragons and humans have lived in peace, albeit on separate worlds ­ humans in their homeland, and dragons exiled to the depths of Aether. But the peace was not to last, for the Dark Dragon Elga would lead a revolt that would bring the death of the Dragon Lord and an invasion of dragons to the human world. That was one thousand years ago; the Five Heroes defeated Elga in battle and imprisoned him in the labyrinth of the Shadow Cabinet. But the victory brought about by the Five Heroes doesn’t last. One of them, Paris, promised Elga freedom in exchange for immortality and beauty, she then launched an attack against her old allies ­ and looked to Elga to form an alliance. The only question that remains is: will peace ever return to the world of Dragon Saga?

Dragon Saga allows for you to play in a unique skills ­based action combat and adventure alone or with friends, over the game’s more than 30 unique maps. In the game, you will live in a private home, complete with decorations and furniture that will give you in­-game buffs. It’s the perfect place to invite your friends. Now so domestic? Dragon Saga also allows you to take care of and love a large variety of pets, that will also give you in-­game buffs, and sometimes even a ride. Play now, and experience this magical world for yourself.
Graphics: ATI Radeon 9600 XT or GeForceFX 5700 with 256 RAM or better

Title: Vindictus
short_description: A free to play action MMO game with beautiful graphics and intense battles.
Description:
Vindictus is a free to play action MMO game (MORPG) by Nexon, the same people who brought you Mabinogi. This prequel to Mabinogi takes place several hundred years before the story of Mabinogi. In Korea, the game is known as Mabinogi Heroes, though the name was changed for North American and European audiences.

In the beginning of Vindictus, humans are convinced that if they can destroy Fomors, or monstrous humanoids, they will essentially be taken into their version of Heaven, known as Erinn. Players battle through hordes of enemies either alone, with friends, or sometimes with strangers, to take out these creatures. Vindictus is broken up into “Seasons” and with each season, the story changes and brings a whole new level of exploration and understanding.

The game centers around an intense combat style that teaches you to avoid getting hit or die. Fighting Combos are also valued far more than a general face-roll concept many MMOs have found themselves taking on. The ten classes of the game are all gender-locked, as you are portraying a particular character rather than just a class, but some customization of the characters is allowed, including coloring or cutting their hair. The dungeons have dynamic difficulty with the health of the bosses scaling to the number of people in the party.

Vindictus holds true to Nexon’s business model and is free to download and play, while offering a “Cash Shop” for those willing to drop some money on the game. Filled with magicians, warriors, archers and thieves of all varieties, your choices will depend on your personal fighting preferences and your desired role within the game. All classes are intended to deal damage and be self-sufficient as they battle through a real-time combat system. The world has several cities that act as hubs for people to form parties with instanced mission stages where quest objectives are completed. For those seeking beautiful graphics and an intense battle-style, Vindictus may be just the ticket.
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+

Title: Aika Online
short_description: A free-to-play MMORPG with large scale PvP battles.
Description:
Aika Online is a free-to-play MMORPG developed by JoyImpact that is focused on PvP. It’s set in a large fantasy world that is home to many nations and it is up to you to make yours victorious.

There are five different nations in Aika Online. Players choose from six different classes: Warrior, Paladin, Rifleman, Dual Gunner, Warlock and Cleric. Each class has their very own unique set of skills. The combat is focused on leveling up, gaining new skills, and pressing the corresponding buttons to those skills to attack in the environment. There are thousands of quests that you can go on and you never have to go on these quests alone. You will be traveling with your companion that is known as a Pran. You are raising your Pran from its childhood and its attitudes and abilities will change depending upon how you treat it.

The main focus of Aiki Online is its PvP, there are massive battleground fights between 1000s of people in which you fight to obtain magical artifacts, control of territory, and the rights to call your nation the best. Aika Online has some good things going for it: Large scale PvP battles, enjoyable graphics and a good combat system.

Title: APB Reloaded
short_description: A free to play 3D MMO third person shooter game brought to you by GTA creator.
Description:
All Points Bulletin (ABP): Reloaded is a free to play 3D massively multiplayer online third person shooter game brought to you by GTA creator David Jones. APB: Reloaded focuses on the fictional, modern day city of San Paro where two opposing factions are embroiled in a constant battle. The Law Enforcement Faction, who as their name suggests, takes on the challenge of upholding the law and protecting justice.  Gangs, on the other hand, use any means necessary to oppose justice and wreak havoc on any opposing groups in the town.

The city of San Paro is a persistent open-world urban environment where players become the core focus of the content for other players as the race is on for fame and fortune. APB: Reloaded is a PvP driven experiences in which each faction is pitted against each other to accomplish their goals using missions such as Capture the Flag, Keep Away, VIP, and more. Players can advance their character by generating income in a variety of ways including bounty hunting, theft and mugging, and other criminal activities. This currency can then be traded in for more powerful vehicles, weapons and equipment. Through the support of micro-transactions, items can also be purchased in the in-game store using real world currency.

Noted for its multitude of customization options, APB: Reloaded offers players a wide array of choices to make their character, vehicles, and weapons unique and mold them to each individual’s gameplay style. Couple this with the game’s persistent open-world and San Paro is what you choose to make it.
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6420 (2.13GHz) or AMD Athlon x2 5800+ (3.0GHz)
Graphics: GeForce 7800 with 256MB and support for Pixel Shader 3.0, or AMD equivalent

Title: Mortal Online
short_description: A unique free to play First Person sandbox MMORPG.
Description:
Mortal Online is a free to play First Person sandbox MMORPG with a huge medieval fantasy world. This is a unique old-school PvP/PvE sandbox that just requires a little creative energy and the craving for opportunity. You will be able to choose your character’s race and profession, as well as choose your own play style and where you want to place your loyalties in the game…that is, if you have any!

Mortal Online is not for the faint of heart. With “full loot” mechanics, dying means that you risk losing everything you’re carrying with you. Danger is everywhere and safety must be earned. You will need to learn how to master real time, aim based combat where you will decide every move your character makes ­ this where your skills really matter.

In Mortal Online, you will choose your character from among many races, and will choose your character’s profession ­ combat, crafting, magic, trading, etc. You will be able to discover a countless amount of skills along the way, gather resources and tools, master a few or dabble in them all, and even have the chance to be the first to explore a new area of the map to find hidden treasures and unique secrets before anyone else!

Mortal Online offers a free to play mode with a skill cap at skill level 60. In order to unlock the maximum skill levels and fully master your Mortal destiny, a paid monthly subscription is needed, but unlike many other games there are no microtransactions. Unsubscribing will re­apply the skill cap, but your skills will be maxed again when you re­subscribe. Every player will get one free character slot, but you can purchase additional slots up to a maximum of four.

Title: Grand Fantasia
short_description:
A free to play anime inspired 3D MMORPG with customizable characters and 
companions.
Description:
Grand Fantasia is a free to play 3D fantasy MMORPG with anime inspired graphics developed by Easyfun. Journey throughout the beautiful world with customizable characters and companions as you craft and quest your way through the game.

Begin the game by customizing your character and choosing one of the five different starting classes. After you have chosen a class you get to customize your companion, a Sprite, that will be adventuring throughout the world with you. As you level up you are able to obtain job advancements in your class at level 15,30,65 and 85. At level 30 you also get the ability to choose another path and choose another class for your character to level up in.

Your Sprite does more for you than just following you around and helping out in combat. Use your Sprite to forage and craft for you to make sure you have some extra gear to either equip for yourself or sell to some other players for a bit of extra cash. Your Sprites can even participate in PvP events against other Sprites to earn gold and fame.

Grand Fantasia is a cute anime inspired game that has a great selection of customization from the character classes to the companions (Sprites) that you can collect along your adventure.
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz or AMD Equivalent

Title: Grepolis
short_description: A free to play browser-based strategy MMORTS set in Ancient Greece.
Description:
The lands of Ancient Greece await the guiding hands of players who take on Grepolis, a browser-based MMORTS from InnoGames. Grepolis is built upon the traditional city-building gameplay mechanic, but if offers so much more than that.

One of the key pieces of Ancient Greek history was the worship of the gods of Olympus. Grepolis takes that a step further by giving players access to Divine Powers based on which Greek god they choose to worship.

Grepolis also doesn’t limit players to Greek monuments. As players expand the borders of their ancient empires, they can construct the wonders of the Ancient world and place them wherever they want regardless of historic accuracy.

But what would be the fun of an MMORTS if it didn’t allow you to challenge other players? Grepolis features an innovating conquest and colonization mechanic that allows players to take over the cities and empires of others.

And if your city should fall, Grepolis gives you the chance to begin anew in order to forge a stronger empire, perhaps in the hopes of one day reclaiming what was lost.

Players can access Grepolis across browser and mobile devices at their leisure, meaning they can take their story of Ancient Greek conquest wherever they want.

Title: League of Legends
short_description: A free-to-play MOBA game, and one of the most played pc game in the world.
Description:
Did you seriously come to this page to get a description of what League of Legends was? Oh well… if you showed up here I should at least give you the basics. League of Legends is a free-to-play competitive MOBA game, and one of the most played video game in the world, developed by Riot Games.

Players are tasked with teaming up with other players and squaring off against another team of players, typically in 5v5 matches. Three lanes connect a team’s base (or Nexus) to the other team’s base. Defensive measures for both teams also reside in each lane. Players choose a hero from over 120 Champions. Each character has its own skill set and abilities that help it excel in certain areas of the game. The key to winning matches is teamwork and solid reactions to enemy abilities. A strong understanding of the item meta game and what helps each particular champion is certainly desirable.

Push each lane and try to take out your opponent’s defensive turrets (and their ever spawning creeps – small NPC minions that blindly move forward on each lane) and enemy champions on your way to taking out the enemy Nexus and scoring yourself a win.

Along the way, your champion will gain experience and gold and level up their abilities and allow you to purchase game items to modify your champion’s stats and performance.

These battles take place in two different game modes across a total of 4 available maps…although you’re probably only going to ever see one map unless you play in games against AI bot opponents.

In addition to in-game leveling and ranked matches each season, players also have modifiers on their profile through the use of Rune Pages. These pages allow players to “socket” Glyphs, Marks, Seals, and Quintessences to modify stats for you as the player. These modifications are then placed on any Champion you choose to play.

Matchmaking in League of Legends is based primarily on your skill and past match performances. The automated system attempts to match competitors up with players of a similar skill level so as to avoid blowout matches.

League of Legends is often held up as the quintessential free-to-play model in that no aspect of gameplay (besides arguably additional rune pages even though they are not essential) is locked behind a cash shop purchase. The cash shop houses skins, cosmetics, and Champions and currency to purchase these items can be bought with real world money or farmed in-game.
Memory: 1 GB for Windows XP. 2 GB for everything else

Title: Twelve Sky 2
short_description: There’s a lot of world to explore in this fantasy MMORPG!
Description:
There’s a lot of world to explore in Twelve Sky 2, a fantasy MMORPG from MaynGames. Players will be set in an immersive in-game world that allows them to search the widest plains to the darkest corners.

Based on Chinese culture, Twelve Sky 2 makes use of an underutilized theme in order to craft a unique gameplay experience. Players will choose one of three factions to be a part of, each faction determining the player’s appearance and which clan they’re from.

Players in Twelve Sky 2 will also be able to utilize up to seven different skills for varied combat. When engaging in intense PvP combat against friends and foes, variety is one of the strongest keys to victory.

Twelve Sky 2 will cause players to find their own path through the in-game world, but it is along such paths that adventure and glory is often found.

Title: Champions Online
short_description: A superhero MMORPG created by the same studio behind City of Heroes.
Description:
Champions Online is free-to-play action­-packed super-hero MMORPG created by the same studio behind City of Heroes. If you’ve ever wanted to play out your favorite comic book scenes in the form of an MMO, then Champions Online might be just what you’re looking for. Developed by Cryptic Studios and published by Perfect World Entertainment, Champions Online lets you take to the streets of Millennium City to defeat evil villains, like Dr. Destroyer or nemesis you’ve created yourself.

In Champions Online you’ll design your own hero, creating a costume from thousands of individual costume pieces, for a hero that is truly unique to you. You can also customize colors and body types ­ the possible combinations are seemingly endless.

Once your character has been customized to your liking, you’ll be able to battle against the evil forces the world across and even into alternate dimensions. There isn’t any other MMO that offers players the chance to explore such diverse realms ­ from shining skyscrapers in Millennium City to the frozen wastelands of Canada and the underwater city of Lemuria. There is even the foul, mystical dimension known as Qliphothic and the tormented Vibora Bay. Your hero will defeat countless villains, but don’t worry ­ you’ll still have even more lurking in the shadows when you’re done.

The villains you will come up against are plentiful, and range in type from your average run of the mill super villain to aliens, giant monsters and members of secret and sinister organizations. You see, Doctor Destroyer is launching a new plan to conquer the world, VIPER lurks in the shadows, the ancient Lemurians are plotting a return to power and the Mechanon won’t stop until it has wiped all organic life from the face of the planet. Will you step up to stop these horrible villains?
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 / ATI Radeon X700 or HD / Intel Graphics with Dual Core

Title: WolfTeam
short_description: A free to play MMOFPS with a twist.
Description:
Wolf Team is a free to play tactical lobby-based multiplayer online FPS with a twist, the ability to switch between humans (guns) and werewolves (melee attacks) based on your situation. Players can freely switch between their human and wolf counterparts to give them situational advantages such as higher health or a vast arsenal of weaponry.

In Wolf Team, you enter into fast-paced FPS action with up to 15 other players. There are 15 different maps and seven game modes (including Conquest, Deathmatch or Destruction mode) with a wide variety of weapon options. The backstory of the game shows the player as a soldier sent to destroy some rogue experiments, other soldiers who had undergone mutation, and becomes infected.

Players can rank-up from Recruit to General, though only 1 player can hold the top title. The game tracks your stats, such as players killed, deaths, and ratios, among others. Like most free-to-play models, the game offers an Item Mall with monthly deals and permanent services that players can pay for.

With a ranking system, Prides, numerous game modes, and an extensive armory, Wolf Team is a game worth looking into if MMOFPS games are up your alley and you occasionally have the urge to howl at the moon.

Title: Runes of Magic
short_description: A free-to-play fantasy 3D MMORPG set in the fantasy world of Taborea.
Description:
Runes of Magic is a free-to-play fantasy 3D MMORPG brought to you by Runewalker Entertainment. Set in the fantasy world of Taborea, Runes of Magic allows players to choose between three races and ten different classes with an additional multiple class system. Both the races and classes are relatively standard for an MMORPG and determine the players starting area although there is the ability to customize class skills.

Character creation allows for some appearance customization such as choice of hairstyle and the standard modification sliding bars. Most of the customization comes from choosing a class based on its unique skill set and once the player has reached level 10 the ability to choose a secondary class is available. Combining the skill sets creates 60 different possibilities and can adapt the game to fit each player’s own play style. Choosing this secondary class gives a stat boost to the main class, an additional set of sub abilities to add to the main set, and different combinations can unlock elite skills at specific levels. Each class must be leveled separately and the secondary class is always capped at the level of the main class.

Runes of Magic features over 4,000 quests for adventurers to complete, a series of epic quests, over 20 instances and raids, and a unique crafting system. The crafting system features 9 professions to choose from based on what you feel your character can use to benefit them the most. There is also an extensive pet and mount system, a housing system, and several different PvP modes.
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2 GHz of better

Title: theHunter
short_description: An MMO shooter where players can hunt 22 different animals in various locations.
Description:
Hunting simulation is brought to new depths with theHunter, a free to play realistic hunting game where players can hunt 22 different animals in various locations inspired by real world reserves.

theHunter pushes the boundaries of in-game depth, immersing players in the thrill of the hunt without actually killing live animals. There’s more to hunting than just finding and shooting an animal, and players in theHunter will be called upon to track, stalk, and even identify animals based on different calls and other evidence.

Set in nine different preserves across the globe, this online shooter actually features 127 animals across 22 species, making variations and encounters nigh uncountable. The environments of theHunter make players feel as though their actually prowling through the dense underbrush, stalking a wild animal.

Players don’t have to go it alone, either, as theHunter can support up to eight players in a hunting party.For gamers interested in hunting but don’t want to leave their homes, theHunter offers a unique FPS experience that cannot be matched.
Processor: Intel 2 GHz or AMD Dual Core
Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8800, ATI/AMD Radeon HD 2400 (NVidia GeForce 8800, ATI/AMD Radeon HD 2400)

Title: AION
short_description: A high fantasy, free-to-play MMORPG that centers on the war between the game’s two factions: The Asmodians and the Elyos.
Description:
Aion is a high fantasy, free-to-play MMORPG that centers on the war between the game’s two factions: The Asmodians and the Elyos. Developed by the Aion Team and published by a number of publishers worldwide (most notably NCSoft in the US and GameForge in the EU),

New players will choose a faction and then choose one of 6 classes (Warrior, Scout, Mage, Priest, Technist, and Muse) to start the game and will have the chance to further specialize this class upon “Ascending” when you reach level 10. This is also when players will receive the feature Aion may most well be known for, your wings. Using these wings, players can glide and swoop their way down onto foes in both PvE and PvP content.

Since its initial Western launch, Aion has undergone many changes to shed the stigma of the “grindy” game it was viewed as at launch. New content has been added to streamline leveling, a new “Fast Track” server where players can play at a faster experience rate was introduced, and early game content has been streamlined to push players into the newer updates and expansions faster.

PvE players will find a plethora of dungeons (solo, duo, and party varieties) to tackle and can look forward to late game raiding (note that “raids” in Aion are small party affairs) as well.

PvP and PvPvE was, perhaps, the most notable feature in the game when it launched as the flight aspect of PvP introduced a new take on player combat. PvPvE also pits both factions against each other in the Abyss while introducing monsters and NPC characters that both factions have to contend with at the same time. The Abyss also features points like castles that can be taken over by players as this zone is highly dynamic when on an active server.

Aion is available on Steam or through a direct download and still enjoys regular updates.
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.8 GHz/ AMD Sempron+ 2800 (with SSE2)
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT or ATI Radeon X800 XL series card

Title: Atlantica Online
